loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: William Fabian

texts.es:
William es un hombre de 32 años, educado con instrucción primaria, está casado con Martha de 32 años, tienen una hija de 7 años; Heidi. Viven en Latacunga capital de la provincia de Cotopaxi, una de las provincias que forma parte de la Región Sierra del Ecuador. En los últimos años Latacunga se ha desarrollado notablemente de tal forma que es considerada una de las más importantes de la región gracias a la industria florícola, minera, metalúrgica, agroindustria, agrícola y ganadera. Además existen establecimientos de negocios que generan interesantes ingresos lo que le convierte en una ciudad comercial y con varias oportunidades para salir adelante. En esta ciudad muchas de las fiestas conservan un profundo arraigo y pureza muy cercanos a los orígenes históricos o de la tradición ancestral y que cuando se celebran convocan a personas de todo el país convirtiéndose en el punto de encuentro de muchas provincias. Latacunga es el hogar de los materiales de construcción y son distribuidos desde aquí hacia todo el país. 
William es uno de los hombres que se dedica a la elaboración de bloques de cemento desde hace 13 años, aprendió a desenvolverse en esta actividad gracias al apoyo de toda su familia que siempre se han dedicado a este negocio. Invierte hasta 8 horas cada día con la ayuda de su esposa, él considera que el trabajo duro está en realizar la mezcla de todos los materiales, por eso cuando tiene algún tiempo libre, ayuda a colegas de otras bloqueras en sus actividades. En sus años de experiencia ha tenido que sufrir varias pérdidas primero por robos de los bloques y materiales y segundo por los clientes incumplidos que no han pagado a tiempo, sin embargo William ha salido adelante para darle a su esposa e hija un buen estilo de vida. Ahora requiere un préstamo que lo utilizará en la compra de materiales para incrementar la producción de ladrillos y así sumar su utilidad la cual le permitirá darle a su hija la educación que él no pudo gozar. Fundación Alternativa le ayudó a obtener este crédito con agilidad y confianza y además le ha brindado asesoría personalizada para administrar de manera correcta sus recursos.
texts.en:
William is a 32 year old man with a primary school education.  He is married to Martha, 32, and they have a 7 year old daughter named Heidi.  They live in Latacunga, capital of the Cotopaxi province, one of the provinces that form part of the Región Sierra del Ecuador.  In recent years, Latacunga has developed so remarkably that it is considered one of the most important towns of the region thanks to the floral, mining, metallurgy, agribusiness, agriculture, and livestock industries.  In addition, there are business establishments that generate interesting income, making it a commercial city offering many opportunities to get ahead.  In this city, many of the festivals retain the deep roots and purity very close to historic origins and ancestral traditions.  These celebrations beckon people from across the country, turning this city into the meeting point of the provinces.  Latacunga is the home of construction materials that are distributed from here to across the country.

William has been making cement blocks for 13 years.  He learned how to manage this business thanks to the support of his family who has always been engaged in this business.  He puts in eight hours a day and his wife helps him.  He believes that mixing all of the ingredients is hard work and for this reason, when he has free time, he helps his colleagues from other “bloqueras” with their activities.  He has experienced several losses during his years in business, the first due to theft of his blocks and materials, and the second because of irresponsible customers who hadn’t paid on time.  However, William has gotten ahead and provided his wife and daughter with a good lifestyle.  Now, he needs a loan to purchase materials in order to increase brick production and add to his profits.  This will allow him to give his daughter the education that he himself could not enjoy.  Fundación Alternativa provided him with the flexibility and confidence to obtain this loan. In addition, they have provided him with personal advice in the proper management of his resources.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make bricks

loans.name: Nabijon

texts.ru: Набичону 43 года, женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Климат его местожительство весьма благополучный для выращивания сельхоз культур, а также для скотоводства. Более 3 года он занимается скотоводством. Он продает скот, за которым он присматривался в течение нескольких месяцев. На рынке у него много клиентов. Набичон хочет развивать свой бизнес, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 500 долларов США для покупки скота, чтобы развевать бизнес. С полученного  дохода он собирается обеспечить своих детей хорошим образованием и современными технологиями. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nabijon is 43 years old, married and raising three children.  The climate at his place of residence is quite good for growing agricultural crops and also for animal husbandry.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for over three years.  He sells livestock after looking after it for several months.  He has many clients at the market.  Nabijon wants to develop his business, but does not have enough means to do so.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of $500 to buy livestock in order to develop his business.  He plans to use the resulting income to provide his children with good education and modern technology.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to develop his business

loans.name: Mabinty

texts.en:
This is 45-year-old Mabinty from Torkpoi town in the Southern area in Bo, Sierra Leone. She is married with six children between the ages of 10 and 24 years. Four of her children are currently attending school.

Mabinty runs a foodstuff business within her environment; she sells rice, sweet potatoes, groundnuts, and general stock. She has been running this business for 10 years. She works at the business every day, seven days per week. Her husband is a driver but his income is not enough to support the home. She started this business to raise income in the home. She describes her main challenge to her business as insufficient capital to run her business.  

Mabinty has requested a loan in order to purchase more general stock for resell. The extra income from this loan will allow her improve her business and sent one of her children to university. In the future, she plans to build a big house. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to purchase more general stock to resell

loans.name: Sodik

texts.ru: Содику 46 лет. Он замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 сына. Более 11 лет он занимается услугой мастера по ремонту дома. Его жена работает учительницей в средней школе и получает маленькую зарплату. Содик серьезно болен, и ему срочно надо лечится. Его доход не позволяет ему купить лекарство для лечения. Он запрашивает займ для покупки лекарств. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sodik is 46 years old, married and raising one son.  He has been involved in providing home repair services for over 11 years.  His wife works as a teacher at a secondary school and earns a small salary.  Sodik is seriously ill and urgently needs to get treatment.  His income does not allow him to purchase the medications for treatment.  He is requesting this loan to purchase medications.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase medications for himself

loans.name: Lkagvasuren

texts.en:
Lkagvasuren is a 42-year-old single man. He lives alone in a small house which he built in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been operating a taxi business for six years. During these years he has gained much experience. He gives the income he earns to his sister for saving. He earns around $300 a month from his taxi business. 

Lkagvasuren's first loan was used to purchase a second-hand car, due to safety regulations for transportation. He said THANK YOU KIVA. This will be his second loan though Credit Mongol and he is one of their most reliable customers. Now he is requesting a loan 1,500,000 MNT to purchase construction materials to fix his wooden house.

loans.use: purchase construction materials to fix his house

loans.name: Batmonh

texts.en:
Mr. Batmunlkh, 41 years old, lives with his wife and three children in Ger, in the province of Arkhangai, Mongolia. His wife works as saleswoman at a food store. His three children are Tserenlham, an 18-year-old first-year university student, Myagmarsuren, a 14-year-old secondary school student, and Otgonjargal, a 3-year-old attending kindergarten.

A modest and diligent person, Mr.Batmunkh has been operating a taxi service for the last five years, earning a daily income of about 20,000-35,000MNT. He is requesting a loan of 2,000,000MNT to cover his daughter's university tuition and living expenses in Ulaanbaatar city.

loans.use: to cover his daughter's university tuition and living expenses in Ulaanbaatar city.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase clothing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Jesus Saul

texts.es: Jesús, tiene 31 años de edad, es soltero y vive con sus padres en una aldea del municipio de  Gracias, Lempira. Jesús se ha dedicado al servicio de transporte desde hace 5 años, comenzó trabajando con una moto taxi que alquilo para transportar personas dentro de la ciudad. Ahora ya tiene su propia moto taxi, la que le genera más ingresos, esta la adquirió mediante préstamos con ODEF. Actualmente está solicitando ya el tercer préstamo que es por 21,000 Lempiras, el cual lo utilizara para cambiar el techo de su vivienda que está muy dañado, va cambiar madera y láminas. Con las ganancias obtenidas de su negocio cubrirá el pago del préstamo. Tiene como metas seguir trabajando para continuar sus estudios  y comprar otra moto taxi para aumentar los ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jesús, age 31, is single and lives with his parents in a neighborhood in the town of Gracias, Lempira. He has been in the transportation service sector for five years. Jesús started working with a rented motorcycle taxi so that he could transport people across the city. Now he has a motorcycle taxi of his own. Jesús has been able to generate more income with the help of the loans he acquired from ODEF.

He is requesting his third loan in the amount of 21,000 HNL and the money will be used to replace the damaged roof of his home. Jesús will replace the wood and the metal sheets. The profits he generates from his business will be used to repay this loan. Jesús has aspirations to keep working so that he can continue his studies and purchase another motorcycle taxi to help him increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wood and metal sheets so that he can repair the roof of his home.

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling dried fish in the Philippines.   She is borrowing PHP 30000 through NWTF to buy more stocks of dried fish to sell for her dried fish business.

Cristita has been in this business for 20 years and also earns more income from a general store.   Cristita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: buy dried fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 38 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Gina is borrowing PHP 27,000 through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to raise.

Gina has been raising livestock for four years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock to raise

loans.name: Archie

texts.en: Archie, age 43, is a married entrepreneur of San Roque, Panaon. He has two children. He earns a living from his transport service business. Archie has been doing this for almost three years, and he earn 6,000 PHP a month. To improve business, he is borrowing the amount of 13,000 PHP from GDMPC (which he joined recently) to obtain accessories and tires for his motorcycle. Before long, he hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to obtain accessories and tires

loans.name: Angelica

texts.en:
Angelica is 59 years old, married with four children. Three of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Angelica has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more grocery items like shampoo, detergent, softdrinks and other groceries.

Angelica has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda is 38 years old and married with five children.  Gilda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy more items such as bread, canned goods, soft-drinks and other groceries.

Gilda has been in this business for eight years and has previously received funds through Kiva.  Gilda aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Jose Julian

texts.es: José Julián de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijas en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz elotero y ya tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura, desde pequeño su padre le enseño el oficio y hoy ha adquirido gran experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas para la venta, el terreno de cultivo se ubica en una zona de alto potencial agrícola y esta cercano a donde vive, todo el elote que produce lo vende en los alrededores de la comunidad y tiene mucha clientela fija que lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a precios accesibles además del buen servicio; José es un hombre entregado a su labor, enérgico y sobre todo motivado de buscar nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc. José Julián tiene buenas referencias de pago y esta muy contento con la ayuda, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose Julian, 39 years old, lives with his common-law wife and their children in their own house. He works growing sweetcorn, and has spent many years working in agriculture. Since he was very little, his father taught him the profession and now he has acquired a good deal of experience that allows him to obtain better harvests to sell. The land that he cultivates is located in a zone of high agricultural potential, and is close to where he lives. All of the sweetcorn that he produces he sells in the surrounding communities. He has many steady customers that prefer him to other growers because he always fills their needs with high-quality products at reasonable prices, in addition to his good service.

Jose is a man who is selfless in his work, energetic, and above all motivated to find new opportunities that allow him to be successful. He wants to increase his production but he needs the capital necessary to do so, for this reason he is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy seedcorn, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc. Jose Julian has good references and is very thankful for the help. He is sure he will be able to pay back the debt and at the same time offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase seedcorn, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools so he can grow corn to sell.

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
José Santos es un padre de familia que cuenta con 38 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en una de las zonas rurales que conforman la ciudad de Lambayeque. La calidad de vida en la comunidad es de subsistencia, la mayoría son trabajadores independientes en negocios de comercio y crianza de animales, adicionalmente dedicados a la agricultura y ha trabajar como dependientes en labores agrícolas (jornaleros. La zona se encuentra situada a 30  minutos de Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercio de animales menores. También posee una mototaxi con la cual realiza transporte a pobladores de la zona. Asimismo posee un pequeño equipo de sonido el cual alquila para eventos sociales. Cuenta con experiencia de 15 años en estas actividades y se vale de ellas para solventar los gastos de su familia y sacarlos adelante.

José Santos desea ampliar sus ingresos comprando un equipo de sonido con el cual piensa implementar sus equipos y seguir creciendo como empresario, para ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los que piensa lograr su objetivo. Adicionalmente, con parte del dinero, desea adquirir alimento para sus animales

El ha trabajado anteriormente con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado ser un cliente puntual y responsable al momento de asumir sus pagos, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto
texts.en:
José Santos is a 38 year old father. He lives with his family in one of the rural zones that make up the Lambayeque area. The quality of life in this community is stable. The majority of the independent workers are in commercial businesses and raise animals. Additionally, they dedicate themselves to agriculture and work as assistants in agricultural day labor. His home is located 30 minutes from the city of Labayeque.

He dedicates himself to the care and sale of small animals. He also has a motor-taxi which he uses to transport citizens in the area. From this work, he owns a small sound system which he rents out for social events. He has 15 years of experience in these activities and they help him handle family expenditures and move forward.

José Santos wants to increase his earnings by purchasing a sound system which he plans to use in his businesses to continue growing as an entrepreneur.For this reason, he is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles with which he can achieve his objective. Additionally, with part of the money he wishes to acquire food for his animals.

He has worked with Edpyme Alternative before and has demonstrated that he is a punctual and responsible client from the moment he takes on the loans. The people who know him hold him in high esteem and respect him.

loans.use: to purchase a sound system which he plans to use in his businesses to continue growing as an entrepreneur.

loans.name: Farukhruz

texts.ru:
Фарухруз проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Ему 25 лет. Фарухруз женат. Он является отцом троих детей. Фарухруз предоставляет услугу. Он открыл национальную столовую, где работает поваром. В этой области Фарухруз уже год. Он берет кредит с целью расширения своей деятельности. 
Фарухруз берет кредит для приобретения дополнительных столов, стульев и посуды.
texts.en: Farukhruz lives in the city of Tursun-zoda.  He is 25 years old, married and a father of three children.  Farukhruz provides a service.  He opened a national cafe, where he works as a chef.  Farukhruz has been in this field for one year.  He is requesting this loan to expand his business.  Farukhruz wants to purchase additional tables, chairs and dishware.

loans.use: to purchase additional tables, chairs and dishware

loans.name: Liberacion

texts.en:
Liberacion is 50 years old, and a married mother of seven children. Four of her children are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Liberacion has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF, to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Liberacion has been in this business for 20 years. She would like to save enough money in the future, so that she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia is 53 years old and widowed; she has six children. She earns a living by farming corn in the Philippines. 

Julia is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF, to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies. She has been farming corn for 30 years, and she earns additional income from farming rice and food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Leny

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Leny works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane.  Leny is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like noodles, eggs, sugar, soap, etc. for her general store business.

Leny has been sustaining her business activities through her past ten loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like noodles, eggs, sugar, soap, etc.

loans.name: Manvel

texts.ru:
Манвел занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом в городе Капане на протяжении 12 лет. В построенной своими руками теплице Манвел выращивает фасоль, огурцы, лук, редис, зелень и т.д. Выращенную сельскохозяйственную продукцию Манвел продает скупщикам с городского рынка. Благодаря ведению сельскохозяйственного бизнеса Манвел содержит семью и платит за обучение старшего сына в Капанском Европейском Университете. 
По специальности Манвел строитель, и этот факт позволил ему самостоятельно соорудить теплицу. Жена Манвела домохозяйка, а младший сын помогает отцу в ведении сельскохозяйственного бизнеса. 
Манвелу необходим кредит на сумму 500.000 драм для приобретения целлофана и труб для ремонта своей теплицы перед наступление холодов, а также для покупки семян для засева. 
Манвел получал кредит от организации Нор Оризон дважды и всегда выплачивал его вовремя.
texts.en: Manvel has been involved in an agricultural business in the city of Kapan for 12 years.  He grows beans, cucumbers, onions, radishes, greens and the like in a greenhouse that he built himself.  Manvel sells the produce to buyers from the city market.  Thanks to the agricultural business, he is able to support his family and pay for his oldest son's education at the Kapan European University.  Manvel is a construction worker by trade, and this fact allowed him to build the greenhouse by himself.  His wife is a homemaker, and the youngest son helps the father to run the agricultural business.  Manvel needs a loan in the amount of 500,000 dram to purchase plastic and pipes to repair his greenhouse prior to the onset of cold weather, and also to purchase seeds for sowing.  This is Manvel's second time obtaining a loan from Nor Horizon, and he always repays on-time.

loans.use: to purchase plastic and pipes to repair his greenhouse prior to the onset of cold weather, and also to purchase seeds for sowing

loans.name: Sayram

texts.ru: Сайрам жительница города Турсунзаде. Ей 61 год. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Сайрам более двенадцати лет занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Она берет кредит для посева осеннего урожая пшеницы и закупа минеральных удобрений для урожая лука.
texts.en: Sayram is a resident of the city of Tursun-zoda.  She is 61 years old, married and has three children.  Sayram has been involved in sowing agricultural crops for over twelve years.  She is requesting this loan to sow an autumn harvest of wheat and purchase mineral fertilizers for the onion harvest.

loans.use: to sow an autumn harvest of wheat and purchase mineral fertilizers for the onion harvest

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta Alicia de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; Ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a la crianza y venta de pollos  tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro  y ha ganado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su pequeña granja de pollos esta en su vivienda muy accesible para trabajar, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque siempre posee lo que necesitan, con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Marta es una mujer dedicada a su labor, muy humilde, enérgica y luchadora, todos los días se levanta dispuesta a lograr sus metas, se esfuerza al máximo pues sabe que así alcanzara el éxito que tanto desea, en la ultima temporada no pudo obtener las ganancias esperadas por eso quiere recuperarse y realizar una nueva inversión para ello le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pollos y concentrado. Marta Alicia tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, agradece la ayuda que le brindan y al mismo tiempo asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida como se la merecen.
texts.en:
Marta Alicia is 52 years old and lives with her common-law husband and their children. She works in agriculture, specifically the raising and selling of chickens. She has several years of experience working in the area, and has gained a lot of experience that allows her to earn more money. Her small chicken farm is in her home. She sells in all the areas of the community since she has many customers that prefer her to other sellers. This is because she always fills their needs with high-quality products at reasonable prices, but above all because of her excellent service.

Marta is a woman who is very dedicated to her work, very humble, energetic, and is a fighter. Every day she gets up ready to achieve her goals. She works as hard as she can since she knows that she will be able to reach the success that she so desires. Last season, she wasn't able to achieve the income that she wanted, and for that reason she needs to recover and invest in her business. For that reason, she is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy more chickens and feed. Marta Alicia has many good references and impeccable morals. She is grateful for this loan, and is sure that she will be able to pay off the debt, while at the same time she has faith that she will give her family a better quality of life, just like they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and feed.

loans.name: Feliza

texts.en:
This is Feliza. She previously accessed a 10,000 PHP loan that she used to buy a machine needed in her vulcanizing shop. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another loan, this time for 20,000 PHP, for the maintenance of the machines in her vulcanizing shop. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Feliza hopes her business will grow in the coming years and dreams of being able to give her children a good and quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members* to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of her machine and to buy parts for her vulcanizing shop.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment for her fishing business.

NWTF is presenting Maria's business for funding of another loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.ru: Жумагул жительница Яванского района. Ей 36 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж вместе с сыном находится в Российской Федерации. Жумагул имеет среднее образование. Она занимается животноводством. Жумагул разводит овец, коз, а также она разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. В этой области Жумагул четыре года. Она берет кредит для закупа мелко - рогатого скота с целью увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en: Jumagul is a resident of the Yavan district.  She is 36 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband and son are in the Russian Federation.  Jumagul has a secondary education.  She is involved in animal husbandry.  Jumagul breeds sheep, goats and cattle at home.  She has been in this business for four years.  She is requesting this loan to buy small livestock in order to increase livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy small livestock in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Khudoyor

texts.ru: Худоёр проживает в районе Яван. Он женат. Ему 38 лет. У него пятеро детей. Жена Худоёра работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Худоёр занимается растениеводством. Он в основном выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности Худоёр занимается 7 лет. Он берет кредит для посева повторного урожая.
texts.en: Khudoyor lives in the Yavan district.  He is 38 years old, married and has five children.  Khudoyor's wife works at a dekhan farm.  Khudoyor is involved in agriculture.  He primarily grows vegetables.  Khudoyor has been in this business for seven years.  He is requesting this loan to sow a repeat harvest.

loans.use: to sow a repeat harvest

loans.name: Sadbarg

texts.ru: Садбарг проживает в Яванском районе. Она замужем. Ей 29 лет. У нее трое детей. Садбарг живет вместе с мужем, свекровью и свекром. Ее муж вместе с родителями работают в государственном учреждении. Сама Садбарг домохозяйка. Она хочет заняться своим бизнесом. Садбарг взяла в аренду помещение, где она намерена открыть продуктовый магазин. С этой целью Садбарг обратилась в нашу организацию за кредитом. Она берет кредит для приобретения продуктов питания, чтобы начать свою деятельность.
texts.en: Sadbarg lives in the Yavan district.  She is 29 years old, married and has three children.  Sadbarg lives with her husband and parents-in-law.  Her husband and parents work at a government institution.  Sadbarg is a homemaker.  She wants to get involved in her own business.  Sadbarg leased a space, where she intends to open a food market.  With this goal in mind, she came to our organization for a loan.  She is requesting this loan to purchase food products in order to start her business.

loans.use: to purchase food products in order to start her business

loans.name: Jesus Maria

texts.es:
Jesús María tiene  57 años de edad, ha enviudado recientemente y vive junto a un hijo. Cuenta con casa propia ubicada  en un caserío a 10 kilómetros del Distrito Las Lomas, cuenta con Luz eléctrica pero no con agua y desagüe.

Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual ella atiende hace 8 años aproximadamente.  Allí ofrece en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida, adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos. Con estas actividades ella trata de sacar adelante a su familia.

Jesús María desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más productos de modo que pueda mejorar sus ingresos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Jesus Maria es una mujer bastante trabajadora y de muy buen carácter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño. Ella ya ha mantenido préstamos financiados a través del fondo Kiva anteriormente, y se encuentra muy agradecida con las personas que le ayudaron a salir adelante en su momento. Del mismo modo agradece a las personas que le apoyarán en este crédito.
texts.en:
Jesús María is 57 years of age, recently widowed, and lives with her son. She has her own house in a village located 10 kilometers from the Las Lomas district. Her home has electricity but lacks piped water and sewage facilities.

Jesús María has a small store in her home, which she has run for about eight years. In her store she sells various basic products to her neighbors and customers from the area, such as staple items and groceries. Her business has been warmly welcomed in the area, and she also works raising and selling pigs. These businesses allow her to help her family get ahead.

Jesús María wants to expand her business by acquiring more products, thereby improving her income. This is why she has requested a loan of 2,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which will help her to meet this goal. Jesus Maria is a hard-working and good-natured woman, and everyone who knows her thinks highly of her. She has already had loans managed through Kiva funds in the past, and is thankful to those people who helped her to get ahead during those times. She also thanks the people who will support her in this loan.

loans.use: To buy staple items and groceries to expand her store.

loans.name: Adonay

texts.es: Adonay de sesenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su familia en casa propia; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a la venta de ganado de engorde y al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, para cada cosecha mejora la calidad de su trabajo, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores del lugar y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Adonay es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, siempre buscando las mejores oportunidades para superarse y alcanzar el éxito, en esta temporada  desea aumentar las ganancias pero necesita de capital para invertir en los insumos por eso le solicita  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ganado, semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, herramientas, etc. Adonay  tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente muy contento y agradecido con la ayuda que le brindan por lo que asegura  saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Adonay, 71 years old, lives with her family in their own house. He works in agriculture, specifically the sale of beef cattle and the cultivation of corna nd beans. He has worked in this area for many years, and has very valuable experience that allows him to obtain a higher income. For every harvest, he increases the quality of his work. The land where he cultivates is located in a zone of high agricultural potential. He sells in all the areas around his location and already has many customers since the people know that everything that he sells is of the highest quality and a reasonable price, in addition to the fact that he offers unequaled service.

Adonay is a very enterprising man, who is dedicated to his work and always looking for better opportunities to make himself better and achieve success. In this season, he wants to increase his income but needs the capital to invest in the inputs. For this reason, he is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy cattle, seedcorn, beans, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc. Adonay has good references and is very responsible, he is very content and thankful for the help. He is sure that he will be able to pay back the loan and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use:
ganado, semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, herramientas
to purchase cattle, seedcorn, beans, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан житель района Яван. Ему 54 года. Он вдовец. Хасан на протяжении 35 лет преподает в школе. Кроме того он занимается торговлей. У Хасана имеется магазин, где он продает продукты и одежду. В этой области Хасан 30 лет. Он берет кредит для покупки товаров.
texts.en: Hasan is a resident of the Yavan district.  He is 54 years old and a widower.  Hasan has been teaching at a school for 35 years.  Besides this, he is involved in sales.  Hasan has a store, where he sells food products and clothing.  He has been in this business for 30 years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise

loans.name: Pardahol

texts.ru: Пардахол проживает в районе Яван. Ей 35 лет. Она замужем. У нее семеро детей. Пардахол занимается купле - продажей топлива. У нее имеется торговая точка рядом с домом. В этой области Пардахол восемь лет. Она берет кредит для приобретения горючего.
texts.en: Pardahol lives in the Yavan district.  She is 35 years old, married and has seven children.  Pardahol is involved in buying and selling fuel.  She has a retail outlet near her house.  Pardahol has been in this field for eight years.  She is requesting this loan to buy fuel.

loans.use: to buy fuel

loans.name: Serafin

texts.es: El Sr. Serafín tiene 30 años casado su esposa está esperando un bebe quien será su primer hijo, el  se dedica a la Agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también papa y yuca y maíz en su parcela que se encuentra en la localidad de Rio Seco,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  el Sr. Serafín va a utilizar  este préstamo para la siembra de maíz y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, el Sr. Serafin enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios Para mejorara la calidad de vida del cliente y de su familia ya que el corre con todos los gastos del hogar, es una persona  responsable y trabajador se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado. En la foto el Sr. Serafín se encuentra en compañía de su esposa.
texts.en: Mr. Serafin is 30 years old, married, and his wife is awaiting a baby that will be their first child. He works in agriculture, planting a variety of vegetables such as potatoes, yuca, and corn in his plot, which is located in the Rio Seco (Dry River) region. This loan is his first with this organization. Mr. Serafin is going to use this loan for the purchase of seedcorn and all that is required to cultivate the land. His reason for asking for this loan is to obtain resources for planting and the ability to subsist. Mr. Serafin faces many challenges in his business, such as the changes in the weather which, on many occasions, ruin his sown fields. He will use this loan to increase the quality of life of his clients and his own family, since he already manages all of the expenses of his home. He is a very responsible and hard-working person who is very thankful for the loan. In the photo, Mr. Serfain is with his spouse.

loans.use: To purchase seedcorn and everything else necessary to cultivate the land.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия очень трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина. Ей 44 года, она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она имеет более чем 8 лет опыта в бизнесе. Она занимается куплей продажей продукты питания. Также она занимается изготовлением и продажей салата.  В последнее время у нее мало клиентов, так как конкуренция большая. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони  для покупки овощей для приготовления салата. Она надеется на вас и на вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zulfiya is a very hardworking and goal-oriented woman.  She is 44 years old, married and raising three children.  She has over eight years of experience in business.  She is involved in buying and selling food products.  She is also involved in preparing and selling salads.  Lately, she has not had many clients because of high competition.  Zulfiya is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 somoni to purchase vegetables for preparing salads.  She relies on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables for preparing salads

loans.name: Isabel Virginia

texts.es:
La señora Isabel Virginia   posee un negocio de cyber café ubicado en un populoso barrio  de la ciudad de León desde hace cinco años, ella realiza esta labor junto con su hijo ya que es una persona  viuda.

La señora Isabel su negocio consistes en un cibercafe; atiende a su clientela principalmente estudiantes de secundaria que realizan investigaciones para sus estudios, apertura su negocio a las  8:00 am. Ofertándole a su clientela los servicios de internet, levantado de textos y llamadas telefónicas tanto nacionales como extranjera y finaliza a la 10 pm.

Actualmente está solicitando un crédito, el cual invertirá directamente en la compra de una fotocopiadora ya que sus clientes le están solicitando este tipo de servicio y así percibir más ingresos y ayudar  a la comunidad. 

La señora Isabel está muy agradecida con Ceprodel y Kiva ya que le ha ayudado a crecer en su negocio con siete máquinas y cuando inicio solo eran tres,  Doña Isabel Virginia sueña que su hijo llegue  a coronar su carrera.
texts.en:
Sra. Isabel Virginia owns a cybercafé in a crowded neighborhood in the city of León. She has been in business for five years. Isabel is a widow and manages this business with her son.

Most of Sra. Isabel’s customers who come to her cybercafé are high school students performing research for their studies. She opens her business at 8:00 A.M. Isabel offers her customers Internet service, raised text printing, and domestic and international call services. Her business closes at 10 P.M.

Isabel is currently requesting a loan because she wants to invest in the direct purchase of a photocopier. Her customers are requesting this type of service and she will be able to earn more income and help her community.

Sra. Isabel is extremely grateful to CEPRODEL and Kiva for helping her grow her business. She started out with only three machines, and now she has seven. Her dream is to see her son reach the pinnacle of his career.

loans.use: to purchase a photocopier.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena es separada y tiene una hija que esta en la universidad, vive en casa propia en condiciones humildes, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja como empleada en una limpieza ya que es la única que cubre los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una computadora portátil para facilitar los estudios universitarios de su hija.
El sueño de Elena es que su hija sea profesional e independiente. Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Elena is separated from her spouse and has a daughter who is attending the university. She lives in her own home that is in modest condition. The house is located in the District of Achachicala in the city of La Paz.

Elena is currently employed as a housekeeper. This is the only source of income that she has to cover expenses such as food, education, and basic services for her family.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a laptop computer to help facilitate her daughter’s university studies. Her dream is to see her daughter become an independent professional. This is the first time Elena has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer that her daughter can use for her university studies.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es:
Sofía tiene 59 años de edad, es casada tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad, vive con su esposo y tienen casa propia la cual esta ubicada en  un anexo del distrito de Morrope a dos horas aproximadamente de la provincia de Lambayeque, es un distrito pequeño de aproximadamente 20 familias las cuales mayormente se dedican al comercio de ganado y agricultura

Desde hace 20 años atrás se dedica al comercio de ganado vacuno, ovino, y caprino para lo que junto a su esposo ha instalado espacios estratégicos (corrales) para la crianza, engorde y comercialización en los mercados de sus caseríos aledaños, actividad que durante todos esos años ha sido en sustento de familia. Adicionalmente cuenta ahora con una bodega en donde ofrece a sus vecinos diversos productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes.

Sofía ha solicitado nuevamente a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en la compra de más animales, alimento balanceado para implementar su negocio de crianza y venta ante la proximidad de las fechas navideñas, motivo por el cual su demanda siempre aumenta. Del mismo modo desea adquirir más productos para su bodega. 

Ella ya ha trabajado anteriormente con préstamos financiados a través de Kiva y les considera de mucha ayuda para los pequeños empresarios, motivo por el cual se encuentra bastante agradecida con las personas que le apoyaron en su momento y agradece de antemano a las personas que le apoyarán en esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
59-year-old Sofía is married and has two adult children. She lives with her husband in their own home, which is located in a small village in Morrope district, approximately two hours from Lambayeque province. This is a small village of approximately 20 families who mainly work in farming and raising livestock. 

Sofia has been selling cattle, sheep and goats for 20 years. She and her husband have set up strategic spaces (pens) where they raise and fatten their animals before selling them in the markets in nearby villages. Through this business, they have provided for their family over the years.

She now also has a general store where she sells diverse basic needs products and groceries to her neighbors.

Sofía has requested a new loan for 3,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She is planning on using the loan to buy more animals and balanced feed in order to set up her business of raising and selling animals for the coming Christmas season.  This is because her demand always increases.  She also wants to get more products for her store.

She has previously worked with Kiva loans, and she considers them to be a big help to people with small businesses.  That is why she is so grateful to the people who have already helped her.  She thanks, in advance, the people who will help her this time

loans.use: to buy animals and balanced feed.

loans.name: Roslie

texts.en:
This is Roslie, She previously accessed a 10,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She is applying for another 10,000 PHP loan, to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in more profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help to sustain her family’s daily needs and children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Roslie hopes to be able to expand soon and dreams of giving her family a good and quality education. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and she also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery products and inventory items needed in her variety store.

loans.name: Maria Yolanda

texts.es:
María tiene 38 años de edad, es viuda y reside en el caserío Los Damianes ubicado en el distrito de Túcume caracterizado por gente humilde y trabajadora que se dedica a la agricultura. Se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de cuarenta minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

María se dedica a la crianza y venta de aganado ovino y algunas aves de corral, ella cría sus animales en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes de la zona y al público en general, adicionalmente ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chicha de jora  El negocio le sirve para solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar al sostenimiento económico de su familia.

María desea adquirir más animales y alimento balanceado para ampliar sus ventas ya que por temporada navideña la demanda aumenta, asimismo adquirir insumos para la elaboración de la chicha de jora, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Ella ya ha tenido un crédito financiado anteriormente a través de los prestamistas de Kiva, el préstamo le ayudó a sacar adelante a su negocio durante una temporada y por ello ase encuentra bastante agradecida con las personas que le apoyaron en aquella oportunidad. Del mismo modo agradece de antemano a las personas que le apoyarán en esta ocasión.
texts.en:
María is 38 years old and widowed. She lives in the village of Los Damianes in the district of Túcume. This region is characterized by humble and hardworking people who make their living in agriculture. It is located in the province of Lambayeque, more than forty minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

María makes a living raising and selling sheep and some poultry. She raises the animals behind her house, and when they have matured to a good level, she sells them to the traders of the region and to the general public. Additionally, she makes and sells chicha de jora, a drink made of fermented maize. This business helps her to pay her personal expenses and to help sustain her family economically.

María would like to obtain more animals and balanced feed to increase her sales, since the demand is higher during the Christmas season. Likewise, she would like to obtain supplies to make chicha de jora. Therefore, she decided to apply for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

She has already had one loan which was financed by Kiva lenders. This loan helped her to maintain her business during a season, and she is very thankful for the people who supported her on that occasion. She would also like to thank those who will help her with this loan.

loans.use: To buy animals, balanced feed, and supplies to make chicha.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en: Gemma is a 27-year-old resident of Malibacsan, Jimenez. She provides for her three children's needs from the little amount of 2,000 PHP she gains monthly from her own piggery business.  She began this activity two years ago, to add to the income gained by her husband. Since 2008, she's been a member of GDMPC, and she is applying for a loan from GDMPC of 3,500 PHP, to buy feeding supplies. Gemma wants to expand her business, one day.

loans.use: to buy feeding supplies for pigs.

loans.name: Victorine Eleanor

texts.fr: Victorine Eleanor est une jeune Camerounaise âgée de 29 ans, mariée et mère de 03 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 02 et 11 ans et parmi lesquels 02 vont à l'école. elle a comme activité un centre d'appel téléphonique à domicile depuis 10 ans. elle vend également des produits alimentaires toujours à domicile. elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine. elle voudrait avec ce crédit non seulement s'approvisionner en crédit de communication, mais également acheter 01 sac de riz, 1/2 carton de savon, 01 carton de tomates en sachets, 22 litres d'huile de Palm, et des condiments afin de renforcer son stock de marchandises et mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle qui va grandissante. elle a pour ambition non seulement de finir sa maison en construction, mais également de se lancer dans la vente en gros des crédits de communication et enfin d'ouvrir une grande alimentation.
texts.en:
Victorine Eleanor is a young Cameroon woman who is 29 years old, married and mother to 3 children whose age ranges from 2 to 11 years old and among whom 2 go to school. She has been running a business for making phone calls from her home for 10 years. She also sells food products from her home. She benefits from good experience in this domain.

With this loan she would like to stock up not only in communication credits, but also buy 1 bag of rice, 1/2 a carton of soap, 1 carton of tomatoes in packages, 22 liters of Palm oil, and condiments in order to strengthen her stock of merchandise and better respond to the demands of her clientèle which is growing.

Her ambition is not only to finish her house which is in construction, but also to embark into selling communication credits wholesale and finally to open a large grocery store.

loans.use: to buy communication credits, rice, soap, tomatoes, oil and condiments.

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma. Elena works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business, selling dry goods in the Philippines. She has been in the business for eight years.

Ma. Elena requested a 25,000 PHP loan through NWTF, to purchase an additional bundle of dry goods to sell.

Ma. Elena would like to save money, so she could expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundle of dry goods to sell

loans.name: Maximiliano Adalberto

texts.es: Maximiliano Adalberto de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida en casa propia; él se dedica a la crianza de ganado y adicional a eso al cultivo de maíz, ya tiene veinticinco años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro que le permite siempre tener calidad en su trabajo, el terreno donde cultiva es fértil y apto para la siembra, está cercano a la localidad donde vive y comercia en todas las zonas aledañas, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Maximiliano es un hombre dedicado a su labor siempre dispuesto a superarse, sabe que con todo su esfuerzo y entrega logrará el éxito que tanto desea, en la cosecha pasada tuvo muchas perdidas y quiere recuperarse e invertir por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ganado, semilla de maíz, fertilizante, herramienta. Maximiliano Adalberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siento totalmente agradecido con la ayuda por lo que se compromete a cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Maximiliano Adalberto is 49 years old, and lives with his life partner in their own home. He raises cattle, and in addition to that grows corn. He has been farming for 25 years now, and has gotten a great deal of experience in this area, which allows him to always do quality work. 

The land that he farms is fertile and suitable for growing crops. It is close to the town where he lives, and he sells in all the neighboring areas. He already has a large clientele; people prefer him because he always has what they need at affordable prices and with unequaled service. 

Maximiliano is a man devoted to his work, and always ready to improve himself. He knows that with all his effort and dedication he will achieve the success he so much desires. 

In the past harvest he had many losses and wants to recover and invest.That is why he is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy cattle, seed corn, fertilizer, and tools. 

Maximiliano Adalberto has good payment references and is very responsible. He feels entirely grateful for the help, so he promises to pay back the debt within the established timeframe. At the same time he will provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: To buy cattle, seed corn, fertilizer and tools.

loans.name: Sharigul

texts.ru: Шаригуль проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 57 лет. Она разведена. Ее сыновья работают в Российской Федерации. Шаригуль занимается скотоводством. Она разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности она занимается 7 лет. Шаригул берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Sharigul lives in the Shahrituz district. She is 57 years old and divorced. Her sons work in the Russian Federation. Sharigul is involved in cattle husbandry. She raises cattle for sale, which she has done for seven years. Sharigul is taking out a loan to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and cattle

loans.name: Jurabek

texts.ru: Чурабек житель района Шахритус. Ему 48 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Сын Чурабека находится на заработках за рубежом. У Чурабека среднее образование. Он занимается животноводством. Чурабек закупает скот, разводит и через несколько месяцев продает по более выгодной цене. Этим видом деятельности он занимается восемь лет. Чурабек берет кредит для закупа бычков и телят.
texts.en: Jurabek is a resident of the Shahrituz district. He is 48 years old and married. He has five children. Jurabek's son earns money by working abroad. Jurabek has a secondary education. He practices animal husbandry. Jurabek buys cattle, raises them, and after several months, sells them for higher price.  He has been doing this for eight years. Jurabek is taking out a loan to buy bulls and calves.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and calves

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru: Илхому 37 лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 2  детей. Он очень трудолюбивый человек и имеет более чем 4 года опыта в бизнесе. Он занимается куплей продажей рыбы. Он очень хорошо знает все аспекты бизнеса и старается развевать свой бизнес дальше. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки рыбы. От полученного дохода он будет обеспечить семью со всеми необходимыми средствами. Он надеется на вас и на вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Ilhom is 37 years old, married and raising 2 children. He is a very hard working man who has more than 4 years of business experience. He is engaged in buying and reselling fish. He knows all the aspects of the business very well and tries to develop his business further. 

Ilhom requests a loan in the amount of 2000 somoni for the purchase of fish. From the income received he will provide his family with all necessary facilities. He puts his hopes with you and your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase fish to sell

loans.name: Flores Del Jardin Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “ Flores del Jardín” está conformado por 18 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; repostería, venta de bolsas plásticas, venta de ropa, artesanía, venta de pan amasado, bazar, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Temuco.
Carmen, integrante del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en cunclillas en primera fila, ocupando el primer lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste un pantalón de color blanco, polera café con adornos, su cabello es de color rojo y lo usa suelto.
Ella se dedica al rubro de confección de vestuario, desde hace 3 años. Se desempeña de lunes a sábados, y algunas veces hasta los domingos, habilito un taller en su casa donde atiende a su clientela y confecciona ropa de mujer e infantil, su horario lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad.
La mercadería e insumos que va necesitando los compra en la ciudad de Santiago en diferentes tiendas y distribuidoras donde encuentra telas a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará telas y un repuesto para su máquina overlock.
Una de las metas de Carmen es tener un local establecido, donde sea más conocida y abarcar mucha más clientela, para generar mayores ingresos asi con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Carmen vive junto a sus padres y su hija de 9 años de edad, quien se encuentra estudiando. Sus sueños a nivel laboral es tener un local establecido, y a nivel personal poder terminar sus estudios técnicos.
Ella está contenta y agradecida de  la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Comenta que las capacitaciones han sido fundamentales para su negocio y también para su desarrollo personal, ya que ha aprendido a organizar y distribuir de mejor manera sus ingresos e inversiones. Respecto al grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que en éste existe muy buena comunicación.
Temuco es la capital de la región de la Araucanía. La ciudad se ubica a 670 kilómetros al sur de Santiago (capital de Chile). En sus alrededores se ubican una serie de balnearios lacustres (Pucón, Villarrica) y una flora y fauna nativa muy llamativas, concentrada en parques naturales cercanos. Cabe destacar que en esta región habita el 50% de los mapuches, pueblo indígena, existente en nuestro país.
texts.en:
This communal bank is named “Flores del Jardín”  (garden flowers). It is made up of 18 entrepreneurs working in various sectors such as a bakery, the sale of plastic bags, clothing, handicrafts, breads, a stationery shop, and other services.  Each of the group members is a resident of the city of Temuco.

Carmen, a member of "Flores del Jardín", is the red-haired woman pictured kneeling at the far right, wearing white pants and a brown, patterned shirt. 

She has been working as a seamstress for three years. Carmen works Monday through Saturday and sometimes also on Sundays. She created a workshop in her home where she attends to customers and sews children's and women's clothing. Luckily, Carmen is able to create her own hours around her availability. She buys the merchandise and supplies used in her shop from different stores and distributors in Santiago that sell fabrics at lower prices. 

With this loan, Carmen will buy fabrics and spare parts for her sewing machine. One of Carmen's goals is to have her own shop in a better location that will bring more customers because this will help her increase her earnings and have a better quality of life.

Carmen lives with her parents and her 9-year-old daughter, who is in school. As a personal goal, Carmen aims to finish her technical studies.

Carmen is very happy and grateful for the opportunity this loan from Fondo Esperanza brings her to be able to invest in her business. She says that the trainings offered have been very helpful for her business as well as her personal development because she has learned how to organize and better distribute her income and investments. As for the communal bank group she belongs to, Carmen is pleased with the communication they have with her.

Temuco is the capital of the Araucanía region and the city is located 670 kilometers south of Santiago (the capital of Chile). Around the city are the volcanos and hot springs Pucón and Villarrica, as well as distinct native plants and animals found in nearby national parks. It is worth noting that in this region lives 50 percent of the Mapuches, an indigenous people, that exist in the country.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and spare parts for her sewing machine.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos; él se dedica al cultivo de yuca y güisquil,  ya tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite siempre obtener las mejores cosechas para el comercio, el terreno de siembra es de alta incidencia agrícola, es alquilado y está cercano a su vivienda; vende por todos los alrededores del lugar y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren por el excelente servicio, la calidad del producto; Mauricio es un hombre visionario y muy entregado a su trabajo quiere ganar un futuro próspero y sabe que con su constancia y motivación logrará ese éxito; en la en cosecha pasada tuvo grandes pérdidas por motivos de fuertes lluvias y en este periodo de siembra quiere recuperarse pero necesita de un respaldo de capital con el que pueda invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de yuca, güisquil, fertilizante, herbicida, herramienta etc. Mauricio tiene buen record de crédito y es muy responsable con sus pagos mantiene su palabra de que podrá cancelar la deuda en el tiempo establecido y a la vez tiene esperanza de llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Mauricio is 29 years old, and lives with his life partner and their two children. He grows yuca and pear squash, and already has several years of working in farming. He has gained a great deal of experience which allows him to always obtain the most marketable harvests. 

His farmland is highly productive. It is rented and close to his home. He sells in all the neighboring areas, and already has a large clientele, as people prefer him for his excellent service and the quality of this product. 

Mauricio is a man who looks to the future, and is very dedicated to his work. He wants to gain future prosperity, and knows with that with his perseverance and motivation he will achieve that success. 

In the past harvest he had substantial losses because of the heavy rains, and wants to recover in this growing season. But he needs the support of working capital for investing in agricultural supplies. That is why he is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy yuca and pear squash seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, and tools. 

Mauricio has a good credit record and is very responsible with his payments. He gives his word that he will be able to pay back the debt within the established timeframe, and at the same time hopes to bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: To buy yuca and pear squash seeds, fertilizer, herbicide and tools.

loans.name: Levy Azucena

texts.es:
Levy, está decidida por continuar trabajando por la temporada con la venta de flores artificiales, por eso solicita un préstamo que le permita en la temporada de Noviembre tener surtido el negocio de distintas flores. Ella se comprara con los fondos prestados papel de china, crespón, lustre, y otros materiales para la elaboración de coronas de flores y arreglos, que son utilizados para el día de los difuntos. 
Ella se ha mantenido en el negocio de las piñatas, con el préstamo anterior logro comprarse materiales para la elaboración, con esto ha podido mejorar sus ingresos, en su familia no han tenido ninguna circunstancia.
texts.en:
Levy is determined to keep working as the season for selling artificial flowers is approaching. She needs a loan that will allow her to have enough different flowers in stock for November. With the loan she will buy tissue paper, crape, gloss, and other materials to make flower crowns and arrangements that are used for the day of the dead.

Levy still has her piñata business and with the previous loan she was able to buy materials to make her items, which allowed her to improve her income. She has not had any problems with her family.

loans.use: buy tissue paper, crape, gloss, and other materials to make flower crowns and arrangements.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
Andrea, necesita invertir en su negocio, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de materiales que a diario utiliza en la venta: maíz, quesillo, aceite, entre otros productos, este crédito le ayudara a permanecer en el negocio.
Con el préstamo anterior Andrea considera que le permitió crecer y tener la materia prima para trabajar, en su familia las circunstancias han cambiado teniendo mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Andrea needs to invest in her business; she needs a new loan to buy materials that she uses daily like corn, cheese, oil and other products. The loan will help her keep her business going.

With the previous loan, Andrea believes that it allowed her to grow and to have the raw materials to keep working. Her family’s circumstances have changed since they are receiving better earnings.

loans.use: buy corn, cheese, oil and other products.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de invertir en el cultivo de maíz, se comprara nuevamente los insumos agrícolas como el abono, insecticidas, pesticidas, que son utilizados para prevenir las plagas y para fortalecer la producción.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior, fue que le permitió tener los insumos para realizar la siembra así pudo hacer su trabajo, con ello ha logrado mejorar las condiciones de sus familias, teniendo una mejor condición.
texts.en:
Luis needs a new loan to invest in his corn harvest, he will buy once more agricultural materials like manure, insecticides, and pesticides that are used to prevent plagues and strengthen the plant’s production.

The previous loan helped him have materials to grow his crop and do his job. This has helped him improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: buy agricultural materials like manure, insecticides, and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy fish and shrimp as well as ice boxes.

loans.name: Sandra Maritza

texts.es:
Sandra tiene 24 años de edad, está casada, vive en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Quimistan, Santa Bárbara, junto a su conyugue y su hijo.
Sandra siempre le ha gustado el comercio y hace dos años que decidió establecer su propio negocio de pulpería para vender productos alimenticios como ser: granos básicos, azúcar, productos de limpieza, sal, manteca, huevos, refrescos, churros, condimentos, productos enlatados, pan etc. la pulpería tiene un inventario de variedad de productos y cuenta con muy buena clientela. Ella solicita un préstamo por 21,000 Lempiras para surtir mas el negocio de productos de consumo diario como huevos, manteca, granos básicos, azúcar, sal, café, pan, lácteos, carnes, productos de aseo, embutidos, churros y refrescos, con esta inversión mantendrá surtido el negocio y satisfechos a sus clientes. Su meta es tener siempre su fuente de ingresos para ayudar a su familia a vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Sandra, 24, is married and lives with her husband and son in a village that belongs to Quimistan municipality in Santa Bárbara.  Sandra has always liked commerce and two years ago decided to open her own grocery store to sell foodstuffs like basic grains, sugar, cleaning supplies, salt, lard, eggs, soft-drinks, snacks, condiments, canned goods, bread, etc.  She has a good variety of products in the grocery store and she has a very good clientele.

She’s requesting a 21,000 Lempira loan to stock the store with items like eggs, lard, basic grains, sugar, salt, coffee, bread, dairy products, meats, cleaning supplies, canned goods, snacks and soft-drinks.  With this investment she’ll keep the store well-stocked and meet customer demand.  Her goal is to always have a source of income to help her family live better.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Santos Tomas

texts.es: Santos Tomas de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y maicillo además a la venta de pollos para complementar los gastos del hogar; tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de mucha incidencia agrícola  muy cercano a la zona donde reside, comercia en todos los lugares aledaños y ya tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Santos es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que se le presentan, en la última cosecha tuvo pérdidas y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, maicillo, fertilizante, insecticida, pollos, etc. Santos Tomas tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, esta muy agradecido con la ayuda por eso asegura que pagara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida llena de las comodidades que se merecen.
texts.en:
Santos Tomas is 29 years old. He lives with his life partner and their child. He is a farmer and he specifically grows corn and sorghum. He also sells chickens to supplement his household income. He has been working in this trade for several years and has gained lots of experience, which allows him to obtain the best harvests. The land he works is located in a highly agricultural area very near where he lives. He sells his crops in all the surrounding areas and has a large customer base because everything he sells is top quality, his prices are affordable, and his service is excellent.

Santos is an enterprising man who is very eager to get ahead. He is always looking for new opportunities that arise. He suffered losses with his last harvest and he wants to recover. That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral, so that he can purchase corn seed, sorghum, fertilizers, insecticide, chickens, etc. 

Santos Tomas has good credit references and is very responsible. He is very grateful for the help and assures that he will pay off the debt while at the same time providing his family with a better quality of life and all the comforts they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase corn seed, sorghum, fertilizers, insecticide, and chickens.

loans.name: Juana Oneyda

texts.es:
Juana tiene 26 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos vive en una colonia suburbana de San Pedro Sula junto a sus hijos, esposo y su padre.
 Juana  es una persona muy trabajadora, anteriormente se dedicaba a vender ropa pero hace dos años y medio decidió con su esposo establecer un negocio de pulpería donde vende granos básicos, leche, café, sal, productos enlatados, refrescos, pampers, cuadernos, cosméticos, etc. además cuenta con un puesto de frutas y verduras. Ella ha sacado el negocio de verduras y frutas a un puesto enfrente de la casa de un familiar que está cerca a su casa porque hay mas tránsito de personas y logra vender rápido su producto. 
Ha solicitado ya tres préstamos a ODEF con el actual que es por 15,000 lempiras, con el cual va surtir mas su negocio de productos de consumo diario para la pulpería y frutas y verduras, con el fin de ofrecer más productos a sus clientes y mejorar las ventas. 
Su meta es mantener surtido los dos negocios la pulpería y la venta de frutas y verduras para aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Juana, 26, is married and has two children; she lives in a suburban neighborhood in San Pedro Sula with her husband, children and father.  Juana is a very hardworking person who used to sell clothes but two and a half years ago she and her husband decided to open a grocery store to sell basic grains, milk, coffee, salt, canned goods, soft-drinks, Pampers, notebooks, cosmetics, etc. and she also has a fruit and vegetable stand.  She’s set up the fruit and vegetable stand outside a relative’s house that’s near hers because there are more passersby there and she sells her products more quickly.

She’s already requested three ODEF loans and the current one is for 15,000 Lempiras she’ll use to stock the store with daily use items as well as fruit and vegetables in order to have more products to offer to customers and improve sales.   Her goal is to keep both the grocery store and the fruit and vegetable stand well-stocked to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es:
Perfil del Cliente 	Luis Manuel es un joven de estado civil soltero habitante del valle Sebaco ciudad muy linda y rica por su producción agropecuaria. Luis se caracteriza por ser una personas trabajadora responsable o es decir que tiene buenos valore morales y espirituales. 

Actualmente es trabajador de una empresa ubicada en su municipio desempeñándose como fontanero, el argumenta que le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que es bastante dinámico y que cada día va aprendiendo nuevas cosas y sobre todo que es la manera de ganar dinero para sustentar sus necesidades personales y la de su familia.

El convive con su mama y un sobrino, su madre es de bajo recursos económico y por tal razón es que Luis se esfuerza cada día para así poder ayudar a su familia. solicita a ceprodel un crédito  para  realizar mejoras en su vivienda el ya cuanta con cierto materiales necesario para la mejora pero específicamente lo que va comprar con el préstamo es zinc, ladrillo y perniles y el pago de la mano de obra.
 
 se siente agradecido y motivado con kiva por confiar en él y por ayudarle a resolver, ya que solo con su salario se le hace difícil poder resolver el problema de su vivienda .
texts.en:
Client Profile:

Luis Manuel’s single living in Valle Sebaco, a very pretty city that’s rich thanks to agriculture and animal husbandry.  Luis is noted for being a responsible, hardworking person, that is to say, he has good moral and spiritual values. 	

He’s currently employed as a plumber by a firm located in the city.  He states that he likes his work very much since it’s quite dynamic and every day he learns new things but above all because it’s his source of income to meet his personal and his family expenses.

He lives with his mother and a nephew.  His mother is of low economic resources which is why Luis strives every day to be able to help his family.  He’s asking Ceprodel for a home improvement loan.  He already has some of the materials needed to do carry out the improvement but he must still specifically use the loan to buy metal sheeting, bricks and roof purlins as well as to pay labor costs.  He feels grateful to Kiva and motivated by it for the trust placed in him and for helping him resolve since his salary alone doesn’t quite suffice to resolve the problem he has with his house.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Eva María

texts.es:
Sebaco una ciudad muy importante de Nicaragua debido a su gran producción y su ubicación geográfica es aquí donde habita doña Eva María una mujer con mucha ganas de de triunfar sobre toda las situaciones  adversa económicamente que se le puedan presentar en la vida, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos de los cuales dos de ellos cursan la secundaria con mucho esfuerzo.

Eva se caracteriza por ser una mujer valiente, emprendedora y con muchas carisma todo estos buenos valores la conllevan a ser una buena persona .
Actualmente es trabajadora de una empresa ubicada en su mismo municipio desempeñándose como con conserje, desde hace mas de 17 años con su salario asume los gasto familiares.

El crédito será destinado para la compra de arena, cemento y pago de mano de obra le es necesario realizar este mejora en su vivienda ya que se encuentra un poco deteriorara pero ella expresa su agradecimiento a ceprodel y kiva por apoyarle con este crédito ya que le será de mucha importancia porque le dará una mayor comodidad y seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
