loans.use: To purchase cement, wire, sand, gravel and blocks.

loans.name: Marcial Salvador

texts.es: Don marcial a sus 61 años sigue siempre  con su negocio en conjunto con su esposa vendiendo zapatos usado ubicado en el mercado de la ciudad de Managua, en su propio tramo adquirido hace 35 años con arduo trabajo y dedicación tanto que han logrado sacar adelante a sus 6 hijos que ahora son independientes. Don Marcial solicita su séptimo crédito para seguir alimentando su venta comprando 5 cajones de zapatos que contienen 24 pares cada uno, para seguir satisfaciendo a sus clientes con más variedad, ya que hoy en día los zapatos de segunda tiene mucha demanda por ser económicos y duraderos.
texts.en:
Marcial, aged 61, runs a business with his wife. They sell used shoes at the market in Managua, in their own stall that they acquired 35 years ago. 

With much hard work and dedication, they have successfully brought up six children who are now independent. 

Marcial requests a seventh loan to continue supplying his business. He will buy 5 crates of shoes that contain 24 pairs each. This will allow him to continue satisfying his customers with more variety, since today second-hand shoes are in great demand, as they are affordable and durable.

loans.use: to buy 5 crates of shoes that contain 24 pairs each.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy undergarments, clothing, perfumes, and second-hand pants.

loans.name: Melania Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Melania es casada, su esposo trabaja como albañil en una empresa del estado sus dos hijos mayores de 23 ya trabajan en costura y uno de 16 que está cursando la secundaria, en quien esperan termine sus estudios superiores, Melania sigue con su venta de ropa calzado y también con la costura, sus préstamos los ha utilizado en realizar mejoras a su casa, ahora solicita nuevamente crédito para cambiar el techado de su vivienda en vista de que el que tiene actualmente se encuentran en mal estado, con orificios y cuando llueve el agua se mete con facilidad mas en este mes de septiembre que estamos propenso a huracanes y ciclones por lo que necesitara comprar laminas de zinc, perlines y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en: Melania is married.  Her husband works as a mason in a state run business.  Her two oldest children, who are 23, work in sewing, and one child of 16 years is in high school and they hope will go on to higher education.  Melanie continues selling clothing and shoes and also sewing.  Her loans have been used to make improvements to her home.  Now she is asking for a new loan in order to fix the roof of her home since the one she currently has is in bad repair.  It has holes and when it rains, water enters easily, and particularly in September when the season means getting lots of hurricanes and cyclones.  For this reason she will need to buy zinc roofing tiles, roofing supports, and pay for manual labor.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Mt Livingstone Group

texts.en:
Sabrina is in her late 20s, single and has two boys who are both in school. She has been running a food business for five years selling fried chicken, potatoes and bananas. She works from 6pm to midnight daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.  

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to buy business equipment and restock chicken, potatoes and bananas to sell. Her dream is to one day be able to buy a plot and build a house.

She will share this loan with her loan group, Mt Livingstone, which has 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy business equipment and restock chicken, potatoes and bananas to sell.

loans.name: Juan Alfonso

texts.es: El joven Juan Alfonso de 37 años, es un pequeño comerciante de venta de fritanga del sector de ticuantepe, su esposa labora como bioanalista en una clínica, de esa manera ambos se apoyan para brindarle todas las atenciones pertinentes a su bebe de dos meses de nacido quien necesita de mucho cuido y sobre todo condiciones, por lo que necesita realizar una caseta en la parte de afuera de su casa, para que obtengan mas visibilidad sus productos ante los clientes y así no tiene el negocio dentro de su casa. Solicita apoyo de un primer crédito con AFODENIC y KIVA para poder comprar materiales de construcción como lo son: -7 unidades de perlines a C$ 3,290, -10 láminas de zinc a C$ 5,000, -1 galón de pintura a C$ 700, -2 bolsas de cemento C$ 440, -20 cubetas de arena a C$ 440 que asciende a un total de C$ 9,870 córdobas netos, sin incluir la mano de obra, agradece por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Juan Alfonso is 37 years old. He has a small business selling fried foods in the neighborhood of Ticuantepe. His wife works as a bio-analyst in a medical clinic. In this way they both support each other so they can give all of their attention to their two month-old baby, who needs lots of care and, above all, good living conditions. They need to build a kiosk outside of their house so they can have more visibility for their products where the customers will see them and not have the business inside their house. He is requesting his first loan with Afodenic and Kiva so he can buy construction materials such as: 7 units of purlins at 3,290.00 Nicaraguan córdobas (NIO); 10 zinc roofing sheets at 5,000.00 NIO; 1 galon of paint at 700.00 NIO; 2 bags of cement at 440.00 NIO; 20 buckets of sand at 440.00 NIO. This comes to 9,870 NIO, not including labor. He is appreciative of the support provided.

loans.use: to buy purlins, zinc roofing sheets, paint, bags of cement, and sand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, cement blocks, rebar, and wire

loans.name: Chheng Leang

texts.en:
Chheng Leang is 28 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband (who is joining her with the children in the picture) is a mechanic who earns approximately $12 daily.

In order to improve her family's finances, Chheng Leang is requesting a loan of $1,200 to purchase motor spare parts for her husband to use in his work as well as to resell. By doing so, she would earn more income for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her husband's repair shop and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts to use in his work as well as to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy cement, sand, blocks, gravel, planks and nails

loans.name: Cecil Mariela

texts.es: La joven Cecil siempre trabajando junto a su esposo en una zona franca del país, con sus ahorros ha logrado invertir en productos por catálogos los que vende a domicilio y a sus amistades, de esa manera se gana la vida y saca delante a sus tres hijos menores de 11 años quienes van a la escuela y su mayor deseo es verlos crecer con una carera profesional. Su objetivo con cada préstamo es brindarle mejoras a su casa. Esta vez solicita su cuarto crédito para mejorar la parte de la cocina por que necesita comprar bloques, cemento, arena, hierro, piedrín, zinc, para brindarle mayor seguridad y mejores condiciones a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Cecil, always working alongside her husband in a free trade zone in Nicaragua, with her savings from selling products from catalogs door to door, has been able to earn a living and help her three young children get ahead. Her children are all under 11 years old and go to school. Cecil's biggest dream is to see them grow up to have professional careers.

Her goal with each loan is to make improvements to her home. With this fourth loan, Cecil is looking to make improvements to the kitchen. She will buy concrete blocks, cement, sand, iron, gravel, and zinc in order to make her kitchen safer and improve her house.

loans.use: to buy concrete blocks, cement, sand, iron, gravel, and zinc to improve her kitchen.

loans.name: Tomas Fernando

texts.es:
Tomas es un hombre de 55 años, se encuentra felizmente casado, tiene 5 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Tomas no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Agronomía que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando música y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación Tomas trabaja como estibar, brindando servicios como cargador, adicionalmente también trabaja como obrero de construcción, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana asiste a un pequeño mercado de su ciudad para iniciar su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por la buena atención que brinda a sus clientes.  
Tomas se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de herramientas de construcción, tales como: maderas, cubos, martillos, entre otros; de esta manera Tomas tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado, así él espera poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder mejorar la vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Tomas is a 55-year-old gentleman who is happily married. He has five children who he loves and are his main reason for living. Tomas lives in the city of Chincha. He is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic individual who has the drive to succeed. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and the need to find work, Tomas was not able to study for a professional degree in Agronomy like he had hoped. In his free time, he enjoys relaxing by listening to music. On a few occasions, he will prepare the delicious “Carapulcra con Sopa Seca” (a spicy Peruvian stew served with dried potatoes) to share with his family.

With great effort and dedication, Tomas took the initiative to work as a cargo loader and provide moving services. He also works on construction jobs. Every day in the early morning hours, he heads out to the small city market so that he can begin his duties. He is able to work approximately 10 hours a day. Tomas believes he is doing well because of his experience and the good service he provides to his customers.

Tomas is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, he will be able to buy construction tools, as well as wood, buckets, hammers, and other supplies. This will enable him to have a business that is better equipped so that he can provide better service to his customers and generate more income. As a result, Tomas will be in a position to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy construction tools, wood, buckets, hammers, and other supplies.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es: La señora Petrona tiene 53 años está casada con el señor Zenón, juntos tiene 9 hijos de los cuales 4 son independientes y dos se encuentran en España trabajando, ya que por falta de recursos económicos tuvieron que inmigrar a ese país, por lo tanto la  cliente aún mantienen a 5 hijos que actualmente se encuentran estudiando. La señora Petrona y su familia viven en la comunidad de Sauce Rancho de la ciudad de Cochabamba, su principal actividad es la agricultura, cuenta con terrenos agrícolas donde producen Cebolla, Papa, Acelga, perejil y otras verduras, la señora Petrona con la ayuda de sus hijos y de su marido sigue trabajando fuerte para poder  mantener a sus 5 hijos. El destino del crédito es para la compra de semillas y abonos para su próxima temporada de siembra, con lo cual aumentara su producción y  generara más ingresos. Entre sus sueños y metas es que sus hijos puedan estudiar una carrera profesional para que de esa manera puedan tener un mejor nivel de vida y que sus dos hijos vuelvan que otra vez vuelvan ha estar juntos.
texts.en:
Petrona is 53 years old, and has nine children with her husband, Zenón. Four of their children are grown and independent, and two of those children are working in Spain, since their lack of resources and work at home drove them to seek employment overseas. Five of their children are still in school, and live with Petrona and her husband in the community of Sauce Rancho, which is located in the city of Cochabamba and is known for its farming and agricultural production. The region produces onion, potato, chard, parsley, and other vegetables. Petrona, with help from her husband, works very hard to make a living as a farmer and provide for her children.

With the support from this loan, Petrona plans to purchase seeds and manure for planting her crops. She hopes that this investment will help her to increase her production levels and generate additional income. Her dream is to support all of her children in their pursuit of a professional career, in the hope that they will improve their quality of life. She also hopes that one day her two children living abroad will return home to be with their family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and seeds.

loans.name: Alberto Ken

texts.es:
Alberto es un joven de 20 años de edad, vive en la ciudad e Pisco, una ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, sus atractivos turísticos, los cuales reciben a muchos turistas en todo el año. Alberto es un joven muy trabajador, pero cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho hacer deporte, especialmente jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos de su barrio, pero también en ocasiones le gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Ají de Gallina”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres el solo pudo estudias hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Administración de empresas”.

Día a  día Alberto trabaja en una tienda de venta de electrodomésticos, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar; él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes, es responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Alberto está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al gran apoyo que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda como mejoramiento del techo, refacción de paredes, entre otros que actualmente es de material de adobe, así el podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda de material noble”.
texts.en:
Alberto is a 20 year old youth who lives in Pisco, a city characterized by its warm weather and tourist attractions, which draw many tourists throughout the year. Alberto is very hard-working, but when he has a little time off, he enjoys sports, especially playing football with his friends and neighbors in the neighborhood, but also, he occasionally likes to eat one of his favorite dishes which is the delicious "aji de Gallina ". Due to his parents' limited financial resources, he could only study through high school, but he would have liked to study business administration.

Every day, Alberto works in a shop selling appliances. He works about 10 hours a day and with the fruit of his labor he helps his parents with household expenses. He believes that he does well at work because he is very friendly to the customers, he is responsible, and above all, because he is eager to get ahead.

Alberto is very grateful to Kiva lenders and thanks to the great support they have given, he will be able to make improvements to his home such as upgrading the roof, repairing the walls, which are currently made of adobe material. In this way he can improve his family's quality of life and keep fighting to realize his greatest dream: "to finish building his house with good materials."

loans.use: for housing improvements (renovation of walls and roof).

loans.name: Carmen Rosario

texts.es:
Carmen es una joven e 20 años de edad, la cual es muy entusiasta y sobre todo trabajadora, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Camaná, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, especialmente el cultivo de arroz, maíz, frejoles, entre otros. Carmen vive al lado de su esposo, con el cual tiene 1 pequeño a quien quiere muchísimo y pro el cual trabaja muy duro para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo con mucho amor. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho pasear por el rio y en ocasiones le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Lomo Saltado”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos el solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera encantado poder estudiar una carrera universitaria.

Día a día Carmen trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de hog dog y anticuchos, ella se levanta muy temprano ya que realiza los quehaceres de su hogar y luego se dedica a sazonar los ingredientes para preparar sus platillos; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene muy buena sazón y sobre todo porque quiere salir adelante.

Carmen agradece mucho el gran apoyo que le han brindado los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar mejoramiento en su vivienda como refacción de paredes, mejoramiento del techo de su vivienda, entre otros, así de esta manera ella podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y poder seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y terminar de construir su vivienda de material noble”.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 20-year-old young woman who is very enthusiastic and above all hard-working. Her home is in the city of Camaná, which is characterized by a very warm climate, as well as by the practice of agriculture, especially the cultivation of rice, maize, and beans, among others. Carmen lives with her husband. They have one young son together, whom she loves very much and for whose sake she works very hard, but above all with a lot of love, so that he can have a decent life. When she has free time, she likes to walk by the river and sometimes she loves to eat one of her favourite dishes, the delicious "Lomo Saltado". Due to her limited economic resources, she could only study until the fifth year (final year) of secondary school, but she would have loved to be able to study towards a university degree.

Day by day, Carmen works in her small business selling hot dogs and kebabs. She gets up very early to do her housework and then spends her time seasoning the ingredients for her dishes; she thinks her business is going well because she has good seasonings and above all because she wants to get ahead.

Carmen is very grateful for the great support shown to her by Kiva lenders since thanks to their help, she will be able to make improvements to her home, such as refurbishing the walls, making improvements to the roof, etc. In this way, she will be able to improve their quality of life and continue fighting each day to make her greatest dream a reality: "To give her son a good education and to finish building her home out of quality materials”.

loans.use: to make improvements to her home (refurbishing walls, improving the roof of her home, etc.)

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa es una joven de 27 años de edad, la cual vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, una ciudad que se ubica al norte de nuestro país, en la cual se desarrolla la agricultura, especialmente el cultivo de arroz, plátano, limón, entre otros, asimismo sus pobladores son personas muy amables y generosas. Rosa es una mujer muy trabajadora, y sobre todo una madre muy amorosa, ya que ella tiene un pequeño de 4 años a quien adora y ama muchísimo y es su motivo de vivir y su motor para salir adelante. Cuando tiene un tiempo libre le gusta mucho salir a pasear con su pequeño y en algunas ocasiones le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Rosa logro iniciar su negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella trabaja alrededor de 15 clientes al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de calidad a precios cómodos.

Rosa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá  comprar mercadería para su negocio, en especial comprar arroz, azúcar, fideos, conservas, entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá tener más variedad de productos y poder seguir adelante para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y darle una buena educación a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Rosa is a young woman who is 27 years of age and lives in the city of Guadalupe, which is located in the northern part of the country. This area is developed in agriculture, especially the cultivation of rice, bananas, lemons, and other crops. The residents are friendly and generous people.

Rosa is a hardworking woman and a loving mother. She has a four-year-old son who she loves and adores. Her son is her reason for living and provides her the motivation to move forward. Whenever she has free time, she enjoys spending it with her son. On a few occasions, she enjoys eating one of her favorite dishes – chicken and rice.

With great effort and the use of her savings, Rosa was able to start her business of selling groceries. She works with approximately 15 customers a day and can serve up to 15 customers each day. Rosa believes she is doing well in her business because she is very friendly with her customers and offers quality products at affordable prices.

Rosa is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help, she will be able to buy merchandise for her business, especially rice, sugar, noodles, preserves, and other items. This will enable her to have a wider variety of products and continue to move forward so that she can make her greatest dream a reality. She hopes to have a house of her own and to provide a good education for her son.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, noodles, preserves, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Ana Bertha

texts.es:
Ana tiene 32 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, una ciudad que se ubica al norte de nuestro país, en la cual se desarrolla la agricultura, especialmente el cultivo de arroz, plátano, limón, entre otros, asimismo sus pobladores son personas muy amables y generosas. Rosa es una mujer muy trabajadora, y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Cuando tiene un tiempo libre le gusta mucho ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Tallarín con papa a la huancaína”.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Ana logro iniciar su negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de calidad a precios cómodos y también porque es muy conocida en su barrio.

Ana está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá  comprar mercadería para su negocio, en especial comprar arroz, azúcar, fideos, conservas, entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá tener más variedad de productos y poder seguir adelante para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un local para venta de ropa”.
texts.en:
Ana is 32 years old. She lives in the city of Guadalupe, a city that is located in the north of the country, where agriculture takes place, especially the cultivation of rice, bananas, lemons, and others. Also, the people are very friendly and generous.

Rosa is a hardworking woman with a lot of desire to get ahead. When she has free time she likes to watch television and sometimes she likes to eat one of her favorite dishes, the tasty “Tallarin con papa a la huancaína” [spaghetti and sliced, boiled potatoes in a cheese sauce, with the spaghetti often served with a green sauce containing spinach and basil].

Through her efforts and savings Ana was able to open a business of selling groceries. She works around ten hours a day and can assist up to fifteen clients a day. She believes that her business is going well because she is very friendly with the customers and above all she offers quality products at a good price and also because she is well known in her neighborhood.

Ana is very grateful for the Kiva loans because thanks to the help they have provided she could buy merchandise for her store, in particular to buy rice, sugar, noodles, canned goods, and other items, which allows her to have a variety of products and to move towards attaining her biggest dream: to have a facility where she can sell clothing.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store including rice, sugar, noodles, canned goods and other items

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy merchandise to expand her business.

loans.name: Monica Maria

texts.es:
Mónica es una mujer de 38 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus 2 hijos a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, lastimosamente por diversas razones desde varios años Mónica se separó de su pareja, desde entonces ella dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Mónica no pudo estudiar la carrera de Enfermería que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver novelas en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos deliciosos Chicharrones para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Mónica trabaja como obrera en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana asiste a su centro de trabajo para iniciar sus labores de campo, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Mónica se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá terminar la construcción de los servicios higiénicos de su hogar, ella espera hacer el tarrajeo, pintado y puesta de instalaciones; de esta manera Mónica tendrá su baño en condiciones adecuadas y salubres, así ella espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder darles la educación superior que sus hijos necesiten para convertirse en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Mónica is a 38-year-old woman who lives in the city of Ica, which is in the District of Santiago. She has two children who she loves and are her main reason for living. Mónica is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person. Unfortunately, due to a variety of reasons, she separated from her partner two years ago. Since then, she has focused all of her efforts into helping her family move forward. She lacks financial resources, so she needs to work in order to cover her expenses. Mónica was not able to study for a nursing degree, but she would have liked to have done so. In her free time, she enjoys watching soap operas on television and on some occasions she prepares delicious pork rinds to share with her family.

With great effort and dedication, Mónica works as a farm laborer at an estate in the city. Every day she arrives at her job in the early morning hours so that she can begin her duties in the field. She works approximately 10 hours and believes she is doing well because of her efforts and the friendly manner in which she treats others.

Mónica is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, she hopes to finish the construction of a bathroom in her home. She hopes to complete the plastering, painting, and installation of the fixtures. In this manner, Mónica hopes to have bathroom that is sanitary and in adequate condition. She hopes to continue working and striving toward accomplishing her greatest dream of providing her children the higher education they need to become successful professionals.

loans.use: to finish the construction of a bathroom in her home.

loans.name: Nelson Cesar

texts.es:
Nelson es un hombre de 23 años, vive en la ciudad de 	Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con su pareja, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasmo, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Nelson no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Mecánica que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia. 
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación Nelson trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, el cuenta con una mototaxi la cual utiliza para trabajar, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él sale a recorrer las diversas calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, Nelson puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Nelson se encuentra muy agradecido  con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la reparación de su mototaxi, él desea poder pintar, instalar un equipo de sonido, comprar llantas nuevas y hacer el mantenimiento general de su vehículo; de esta manera Nelson tendrá su mototaxi en mejores condiciones, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para cumplir su gran sueño de tener su casa propia, donde pueda vivir con su propia familia.
texts.en:
Nelson is a 23 year old man. He lives in the city of Ica in the district of Parcona with his spouse. He is a kind hardworking and enthusiastic person who really wants to get ahead. Lamentably, due to a lack of resources and out of a need to work to pay expenses, Nelson  was unable to study Mechanical Engineering, but he really would have liked to. In his free itme, he likes to play soccer with his friends and sometimes cook a delcious ceviche to share with his family. 

On his own intiative, with a lot of hardwork and dedication, Nelson works offering transportation services. He has a motorcycle taxi that he uses to work. Every day starting very early in the morning he starts his work driving around different streets in his city seeking passengers. Nelson can work approximately 10 hours a day and he thinks it is going well for him because of his dedication and because of his friendly treatment of his customers.

Nelson is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he can repair his motorcycle taxi. He wants to paint, put in a stereo, buy new tores and do general maintenance on his vehicle. This way, Nelson will keep his motorcycle taxi in better condition. He will keep working and striving to make his dream of owning his own home come true, where he can live with his own family.

loans.use: to repair his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
Jose tiene 39 años, es padre de un pequeño de 5 años a quien quiere muchísimo y sobre todo porque es lo más importante que tiene en la vida. Su vivienda de Jose se encuentra en la ciudad de Guadalupe una ciudad que se ubica al norte de nuestro país, en la cual se desarrolla la agricultura, especialmente el cultivo de arroz, plátano, limón, entre otros, asimismo sus pobladores son personas muy amables y generosos. En su tiempo libre le gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el  riquísimo “Tallarín con papa a la huancaína”. Jose solo pudo estudiar hasta el sexto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería mecánica.

Con mucho entusiasmo Jose trabaja como obrero en un fundo agrícola, el labora alrededor de 9 horas al día, asimismo también tiene un pequeño negocio de compra y venta de caballos, con lo cual tiene un ingreso extra para su hogar ; el cree que le va bien en u trabajo porque se esfuerza mucho y sobre todo porque quiere salir adelante.

Jose está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más caballos pequeños y así poder mejorar sus ingresos, de esta manera el podrá ir mejorando cada día y podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y poder crecer en su negocio”.
texts.en:
Jose is 39 years old and the father of a five-year-old son who he loves dearly and is the most important part of his life. His home is located in the city of Guadalupe, which is located in the northern part of the country. This area is developed in agriculture, especially the cultivation of rice, bananas, lemons, and other crops. In addition, the residents are known for being friendly and generous people. When he has free time, Jose enjoys eating one of his favorite dishes, “tallarín con papa a la huancaína” (noodles served with a spicy potato salad). Jose was only able to complete school through the sixth year of secondary school. He would have liked to have studied for a degree in Mechanical Engineering.

With great enthusiasm, Jose works as a laborer on a large farming estate. He works approximately nine hours a day. At the same time, he manages a small business that involves buying and selling horses. This enables him to generate extra household income. He believes he is doing well in his work because he gives his best effort and has the drive to move forward.

Jose is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, he will be able to buy some more young horses so that he can improve his income. As a result, he will be able to improve each day and continue pressing forward until he can achieve his greatest wish of providing a good education for his son and growing his business.

loans.use: to buy horses.

loans.name: William Jesus

texts.es:
William es un joven de 18 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, William culminó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Derecho que deseaba, pero le gustaría poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Chicharrones de Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, William trabaja como agente de seguridad en una empresa de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad, seriedad y respeto que tiene en su trabajo.
William se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos para la operación e internado de su Abuela, ya que actualmente ella cuenta con una penosa enfermedad y requiere con un urgencia que se le opere; de esta manera William espera poder ayudar a su Abuela, deseando que su pronta mejoría, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder estudiar una carrera profesional y convertirse en un buen profesional.
texts.en:
William is a single young man of 18.  He lives in the city of Nazca with his parents and siblings.  He is a friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed.  Thanks to his efforts and to his parents' support, William finished high school.  Unfortunately, because of a lack of economic resources and because he has had to work to support his parents, he has been unable to study law, his chosen professional career.  But he still wants to do so.  In his free time, he likes to listen to music, and sometimes he cooks delicious fried chicken for his family. 

On his own initiative, and with great determination and enthusiasm, William works as a security guard at a business in his city.  Everyday, he starts work early in the morning, and he can work for about 12 hours.  It is going well because of his responsibility, seriousness, and the respect he garners at his work.

William thanks Kiva lenders for helping him cover the expenses of his grandmother's operation and hospitalization.  She currently has a painful illness and urgently needs this operation.  In this way, William hopes to help his grandmother and see her make a quick recovery.  He keeps working and putting in a lot of effort so that he can one day achieve his dream of studying for a professional career and become a good professional.

loans.use: to cover his grandmother's operation and hospitalization.

loans.name: Gustavo Omar

texts.es:
Gustavo es un  joven de 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por su alegría, sus clima cálido sus playas hermosas, asimismo sus pobladores son personas con un maravilloso don para la preparación de sus platillos, asimismo es una ciudad donde se baila una de las danzas típicas de nuestro país el cual es el festejo.  Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Omar empezó a trabajar desde muy joven ya que tenía la necesidad de apoyar a sus padres, pero gracias a ese esfuerzo y sobre todo entusiasmo logro estudiar la carrera de Técnico en mantenimiento de maquinarias.

Día a día Gustavo trabaja en una empresa agrícola como operario de mantenimiento de planta, además en ocasiones realiza algunos trabajos extras como por ejemplo trabajos de electricidad, gasfitería, entre otros; él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable con su trabajo y sobre todo tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.
                                                                                                                                                                      
Gustavo esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en la casa donde vive, especialmente realizara tarrajeo de paredes, pintado, instalación de tuberías de agua, entre otros; de esta manera el podrá mejorar sus calidad de vida y seguir trabajando muy duro para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Gustavo is a 21 year old young man who lives in the city of Chincha.  The city is known for its joy, warm climate, and beautiful beaches.  Likewise, its inhabitants are people with a marvelous talent for preparing their typical dishes.  It is a city where one of the country's typical dances, the 'festejo' is danced.

Due to his few financial resources, Gustavo Omar started to work when he was very young.  He needed to support his parents.  However, thanks to this effort, and above all, his enthusiasm, he managed to study for a career as a machine maintenance technician.

Gustavo works day to day as the plant machine maintenance operator at an agricultural company.  He also sometimes does extra jobs like, for example, electrical and plumbing jobs, among others.  He believes that it is going well for him in his work because he is very responsible with his work.  Above all, he has a great desire to get ahead.

Gustavo is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have given him, he will be able to make improvements to the house where he lives.  He will mainly plaster the walls, paint, install water pipes, and do other work.  This way he will be able to improve their quality of life.  He will continue working very hard to be able to fulfill his biggest dream:  Having his own house.

loans.use: to improve the house by plastering, painting, and installing water pipes.

loans.name: Maria Nazaret

texts.es: María de 23 años, no está trabajando, estudia la carrera de licenciatura de contaduría pública, sus padres le ayudan con los gastos universitarios, la joven solicita crédito estudiantil para pagar el curso de titulación, ya que los beneficios que obtendría finalizada su profesión seria  más oportunidades de trabajo y brindaría de sus servicios a la comunidad. María nos dice que gracias al apoyo de AFODENIC y KIVA muchos estudiantes han logrado culminar su educación superior.
texts.en: Twenty-three year old Maria is not working.  She is studying to be a licensed public accountant.  Her parents help her with the university costs.  She is requesting a student loan to pay for the qualifications course because the benefits she would obtain from this final step in her profession would be more opportunities for work and for providing her services to the community.  Maria tells us that thanks to the support of AFODENIC and KIVA, many students have successfully completed their higher education.

loans.use: to pay for a licensing course.

loans.name: Jose Alejandro

texts.es:
José es un joven de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial en casa de su Abuela, a quien ama y agradece todos sus cuidados, él es una muy alegre, responsable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a su Abuela, José no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que deseaba, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace 4 años José trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, él cuenta con una mototaxi la cual utiliza para trabajar, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros y cree que le va bien por el trato amble y respetuoso que brinda a sus clientes.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar los pagos de inscripción y derecho para poder ingresar a trabajar a una empresa de transporte formal; de esta manera José   podrá seguir trabajando de manera más estable y formal, así él espera seguir brindando sus servicios y aumentar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que muy pronto pueda iniciar sus estudios profesionales y así convertirse en un buen profesional y en un hombre de bien.
texts.en:
José is a 20 year old man. He lives in the city of Cañete, in the district of Imperial in his grandmother's house. He loves her very much and is grateful for all of her care. He is a cheerful, responisble, hardworking and enthusiastic person who really wants to get ahead. Lamentably, due to a lack of resources and out of a need to work to support his grandmother, Jose was unable to sudy business administration, but he really would have liked to.

On his own initiative, with much hard work and dedication, Jose has worked in transportation service for four years. He has a motorcycle taxi which he uses to work. Every day he starts working very early, going out on the city streets seeking pasengers. He thinks it is going well for him because he is kind and respectful to his customers. 

José is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he can pay for registry and the fee to start working in a formal transportation business. This way, José can keep working in a more stable and formal way. He hopes to keep offering his services and increasing his income. This will be very useful because soon he can start going to college and have a good profession and be a businessman.

loans.use: to pay for transportation registry and fees

loans.name: Pedro Faustino

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre de 26 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres y solventar sus gastos, Pedro no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Arquitectura que deseaba, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia. 
Gracias al apoyo de su hermano, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Pedro trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, él cuenta con una mototaxi la cual utiliza para trabajar, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de clientes; adicionalmente también trabaja como profesor de danzas típicas, Pedro puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes. 
Pedro se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá terminar la construcción y techado de su habitación; de esta manera Pedro tendrá una habitación adecuada donde pueda vivir en mejores condiciones que le brinden seguridad y bienestar, así él espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para que en un futuro pueda tener su auto propia y así ampliar su negocio para así poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Pedro is a 26 year old man.  He is single and lives in the city of Ica.  He is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic.  He has a great desire to overcome.  Lamentably, because of a lack of economic resources and the need to work from a very young age to help his parents and cover his expenses, Pedro could not study to be a professional architect like he wanted to, but he would really like to be able to do it.  In his spare time, he likes to listen to music and on some occasions he cooks a delicious dish of rice with chicken to share with his family. 

Thanks to the support of his brother, and with a lot of determination and enthusiasm, Pedro works providing transportation services.  He relies on a rickshaw which he uses to work.  Every day, very early in the morning he starts his work.  He leaves to travel the streets of his city in search of clients.  He also teaches traditional dances.  Pedro can work approximately eight hours a day and he believes that it is going well because of his dedication and the kind treatment he gives his customers.  

Pedro is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help provided he will be able to finish the construction and roofing of his home.  In this way, Pedro will have an adequate home where he can live in better conditions which will provide him with security and wellbeing.  As such, he hopes to continue working and striving so that in the future he can have his own automobile and thus increase his business in order to be able to get ahead.

loans.use: to finish the construction and roofing of his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to his house (rebuilding walls, and the roof, among others).

loans.name: Sal

texts.en: Sal (pictured with her mother) is 30 years old. She is single and lives with her mother and a brother in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables and fish for more than five years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her brother runs a business selling charcoal. He earns about $8 per day. In order to improve her family's finances, Sal is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase a motorbike and a trailer for her brother to use in carrying charcoal to sell. This purchase will help him expand his target market and earn more income for the family. In the future, Sal would like to expand her business and rebuild her house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike and a trailer for her brother to use in carrying charcoal to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron, sand, concrete blocks, cement and gravel.

loans.name: Dennis

texts.es: El cliente Dennis, es un señor de 22 años de edad, el cliente es soltero, el cliente trabaja en una empresa de Telecomunicaciones en la ciudad de Cochabamba, actualmente el cliente vive por la zona oeste de la ciudad, aproximadamente a 8 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, la casa donde vive el cliente es propia y de su familia, el cliente vive con sus papás y sus hermanos, el cliente no tiene hijos dependientes y el destino del nuevo crédito es para capital de comercio, el cliente va a comprar mercadería para vender ropa, debido a que sus ingresos en la empresa es muy poco para mantener los gastos de su familia, en la actualidad el cliente mantiene a su familia cubriendo todos los gastos y necesita el capital para el negocio.
texts.en:
The client, Dennis, is 22 years old and single.  He works in a telecommunications business in the city of Cochabamba.  Currently he lives in the western part of the city, approximately eight kilometers from Cochabamba.  His house is his own and his family's.  He lives with his parents and siblings, and has no dependent children.

The purpose of the new loan from the institution is for business capital.  He's going to buy merchandise to sell clothing because his income in the business is not enough for his family expenses.

Currently he supports his family, covering all the expenses.  He needs the capital for the business.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Aydee Gladys

texts.es:
Aydee tiene 47 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, asimismo lugares turísticos muy visitados en todo el año como son las “Líneas de Nazca”, el “Cementerio de Cahuachi”, entre otros. Aydee es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora y cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho cocinar ya que tiene una buena sazón y le encanta disfrutar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “pollo a la Braza”. Aydee es madre de 5 hijos, los cuales ya son mayores pero por quienes ha luchando junto a su esposo para sacarlos adelante y sobre todo sean personas de bien.

Con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo ganas de salir adelante día a día Aydee estudio la carrera de educación inicial y gracias a ello trabaja en su  negocio de guardería, ella labora 8 horas al día y atiende a 10 niños cada día en su guardería; ella cree que le va bien, porque los padres están contentos con su trabajo y sobre todo porque ama su trabajo y tiene mucha paciencia con los niños.

Aydee está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá iniciar su negocio de venta de ropa para niños y niñas, con lo cual podrá originar un ingreso extra y poder mejorar su calidad de vida, así ella seguirá trabajando y luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una guardería más grande y cuidar más niños”.
texts.en:
Aydee, 47, lives in the city of Nazca, a place known for its warm climate, as well as tourist sites that are visited year round, like the Nazca Lines and the Cahauchi Cemetery, among others.  Aydee is a very joyful and hardworking woman. When she has some free time, she likes to cook because she has a very good seasoning and she loves enjoying one of her favorite dishes: the delicious Pollo a la Brasa, a Peruvian chicken dish. Aydee has five children, who are all grown now. Together with her husband, she fought to move them forward and for them to be good people.

Day after day, with a lot of work and the will to move forward, Aydee studied a degree in early education. Thanks to this, she works in her childcare business. She works eight hours a day and attends to ten children every day in her daycare. She believes that it is going well for her, because the parents are happy with her work and most of all because she loves her job and has a lot of patience with the children.

Aydee is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they have given her she will be able to start a business selling clothing for boys and girls, with which she will be able to generate extra income and improve her quality of life. She will keep working and fighting to make her biggest dream a reality: "to have a bigger childcare center and to care for more children".

loans.use: to buy children's clothing.

loans.name: Desiderio Rolando

texts.es: El Sr. Desiderio, de condición humilde, se dedica a la actividad Agrícola y también presta sus servicios como Construcción Civil, tiene un hijo, convive con su mujer casi dos años, el cliente por si solo supo salir adelante, su madre hace poco falleció y le dejo a el solo ya que él vivía en la misma con su madre. Se dedica a la producción de papa en la misma comunidad por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de semilla de papa ya que esta en la época de siembra por lo que quiere aprovechar, pues de esa manera podrá vender mas, lo cual hará que sus ingresos mejoren a lo largo del año. Cuenta con una vivienda propia ubicada en la Comunidad de San Andrés, lugar donde desarrolla su actividad sin ningún problema, además quiere mejorar su condición de vida para que pueda formar una familia y ofrecerles un estatus de vida mejor.
texts.en: Desiderio, of humble background, works in agriculture as well as in construction. He has one child and lives with his wife of almost two years. He figured out how to get ahead on his own. His mother died recently and left him alone as he lived with his mother. He works in potato production in the same community. He is requesting a loan to buy potato seeds as it is planting season and he wants to take advantage of it. This way he could sell more which will improve his income throughout the year. He has his own house located in the community of San Andrés, a place where he operates without any problems. As well, he wants to improve his living conditions so that he can have a family and offer them a better status in life.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Lady Karol

texts.es:
Lady vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, asimismo lugares turísticos muy visitados en todo el año como son las “Líneas de Nazca”, el “Cementerio de Cahuachi”, entre otros. Lady es una joven muy trabajadora y con muchos deseos de salir adelante, pero cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Chicharrón de Pollo”. Gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres logro estudiar la carrera de Técnica en contabilidad, pero debido a que no pudo conseguir empleo tomo la decisión de formar su negocio.

Día a día Lady trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de productos de Belleza, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 5 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y porque ofrece productos de calidad a un buen precio.

Lady está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para abrir una tienda de bazar en su domicilio como  adornos, regalos, ropa, entre otros ya que se encuentra ubicado en una calle muy transitada de la ciudad, así de esta manera ella podrá mejorar su ingresos y seguir trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un gran negocio”.
texts.en:
Lady lives in the city of Nazca, which is characterized by its warm climate and is also home to very popular year-round tourist attractions, such as the Nazca Lines and the Graveyard of Cahuachi, among others.  Lady is a hard-working young woman who is eager to get ahead, but when she has a little time off, she likes to eat one of her favorite dishes, rich and delicious Chicharrón de Pollo (fried chicken skin, a traditional snack). Thanks to the supportive efforts of her parents, she was able to take technical coursework in accounting, but because she could not get a job she decided to start her own business.

Lady does day to day work in her small business selling beauty products, and she works about 8 hours a day and can serve up to 5 customers daily.  She believes that she is doing well in her business because she is very friendly to customers and because offers quality products at a good price.

Lady is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, and thanks to the help they have given, she can buy merchandise to open a variety store at home with different decorations, gifts, clothing, etc.  It is located on a busy street city​​, and thus it may improve her income, and she will keep working and struggling to realize her greatest dream: "Having a great business."

loans.use: to buy merchandise like adornments, gifts, clothing, and more.

loans.name: Odilon

texts.es:
Odilon es un joven de 25 años la cual vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, asimismo sus pobladores tiene un don maravillosos para la preparación de platillos ya que les sale muy sabroso. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho ver televisión y en ocasiones le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima “Pachamanca”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Odilón solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar una carrera universitaria. 

Día a día Odilon trabaja como obrero en un fundo agrícola, el trabaja alrededor de 9 horas diarias y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas salir adelante.

Odilon está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras a su vivienda como tarrajeo de paredes, refacción de puerta, entre otros, de esta manera el podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida  y podrá seguir trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una casa propia”.
texts.en:
Odilon is a 25 year old youth, who lives in the city of Chincha, a city that is characterized by a warm climate.  Its people also have a wonderful gift for the preparation of food and these dishes turn out very tasty.  When he has free time, he loves to watch TV, and on special occasions, he really enjoys eating one of his favorite dishes, which is the delicious "Pachamanca" (Pachamanca is a traditional cooking style where a variety of meats, vegetables, legumes, and cheese are buried in the earth and slow cooked for several hours underground with heated volcanic rocks).  Because of his parents' small incomes, Odilon only studied through the fifth year of secondary school, though he would have liked to study at the university.

Odilon works every day as a day laborer on a large farm.  He works for about 9 hours a day, and the fruits of his labor give support to his parents by helping with the household expenses.  He believes he is doing well in his work because he is very responsible, and especially because he really wants to be successful in life.

Odilon is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since it is due to the help they have given that he will be able to make improvements to his home, including finishing walls, and repairing the door, among other improvements, so that he can have a better quality of life and may continue working to realize his biggest dream: "To have a home of [his] own."

loans.use: for home improvements (finishing walls, repairing the door, and other work).

loans.name: Nelly Yuly

texts.es:
Nelly tiene 29 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo hay una variedad de platillos típicos muy deliciosos, paisajes muy bellos y fauna muy hermosa. Cuando Nelly tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho salir a pasear con su pequeño hijo de 4 años de edad, por quien lucha cada día para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo porque lo ama y quiere lo mejor para el.  Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Nelly solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Contabilidad. 

Día a día Nelly trabaja en un restaurante de su ciudad, ella labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de frutas en su vivienda; ella cree que le va bien porque es responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Nelly está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales como madera, clavos, listones, entre otros para realizar la construcción de un cerco en su vivienda, de esta manera podrá tener mayor seguridad para su familia y podrá seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” poder darle una buena educación a su hijo y tener un negocio de venta de abarrotes”.
texts.en:
Nelly is 29 years old. She lives in the city of Pucallpa, a city which is known for its hot climate and for being friendly and welcoming. There are many delicious dishes typically served here, beautiful landscapes and pretty fauna. When Nelly has some free time she likes to spend time with her 4-year-old son. Every day, she fights to be able to provide him a dignified life, above all because she loves him and wants a better life for him. Because her few economic resources, Nelly was only able to study until the fifth grade of secondary school, but she would have liked to study accounting.

Day to day Nelly works in a restaurant in the city. She works around 9 hours per day and also has a small fruit-selling business in he house; she believes that it is going well for her because she is responsible and above all because she desires to get ahead in life.

Nelly is very thankful for the Kiva loans, since, thanks to the support that they have brought her, she will be able to purchase materials such as wood, nails, beams, and other things in order to construct a fence around her house. This way, her family will be able to have more security and she will be able to continue fighting every day for her biggest dreams: giving her son a good education and having her own grocery business.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials such as wood, nails, and beams, among others.

loans.name: Antonio Guillermo

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 60 años de edad, es casado y junto a su esposa tiene 3 hijos, los cuales ya son mayores de edad, pero a quienes ama muchísimo y sobre todo porque le ha dado unos maravillosos nietos. La vivienda de Antonio se encuentra en el distrito de Santiago, el cual se caracteriza por desarrollarse la agricultura, especialmente el cultivo de uva, esparrago, entre otros, también se encuentran muchas empresas agroexportadoras que brindan muchos puestos de trabajo a las personas del distrito. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre a Antonio le gusta mucho ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz Chaufa”. Desde muy joven aprendió lo que es ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frente, debido a que sus padres eran muy humildes y tuvo la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres.

Día a día Antonio trabaja como obrero en un fundo agrícola, el trabaja 9 horas diariamente y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y siempre realizar su trabajo con mucho gusto.

Antonio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado los prestatarios Kiva el podrá apoyar a su hijo con el pago de la cuota inicial para la compra de una vivienda, ya que actualmente solo vive en esteras, de esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de sus nietos a quienes quiere muchísimo, así el podrá cumplir parte de su gran sueño:” Darle una buena calidad de vida a su nietos”.
texts.en:
Antonio, 60, is married and with his wife has three children who are adults but whom he loves very much, especially because they have given him some wonderful grandchildren.  Antonio's home is in the Santiago district, known for agriculture, especially grapes, asparagus, and other products.  There are also a lot of agricultural export companies that give many jobs to the people of the district.

When he has some free time, Antonio likes to watch television and occasionally he loves to eat one of his favorite dishes, the delicious Arroz Chaufa [fried rice].  He learned what it is to make a living by the sweat of his brow from a very young age because his parents were very modest and he needed to work to help them.

Antonio works nine hours every day on an agricultural farm and with the fruit of his labor is able to pay for his household expenses.  He believes it's going well for him in his business because he's very responsible and always does his job with great pleasure.

Antonio is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to help his child with the down payment to buy a house, because currently he only lives on straw mats.  This way he'll be able to improve the quality of life of his grandchildren, whom he loves very much, and be able to realize part of his big dream: "To give his grandchildren a good quality of life."

loans.use: to pay the down payment on a house

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose tiene 35 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano y también sus pobladores son conocidos por tener un don maravilloso para la preparación de platillos.  Jose es un joven muy  trabajador, pero cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho ver películas pero sobre todo al lado de su famila ya que el es casado y junto a  su esposo tiene 2 hijos maravillosos a los cuales ama muchísimo y por quienes trabaja muy duro para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo mucho amor. 

Por ello día a día Jose trabaja como obrero en un fundo agrícola, el labora alrededor de 8 horas al día, con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a su esposa con los gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Jose está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales como cemento arena, entre otros,para colocar piso en su vivienda, así como también poder tarrajear las paredes, de esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y poder terminar de construir su casa”.
texts.en:
Jose is 35 years old and lives in the city of Chinca. This city is characterized for having a warm and welcoming atmosphere. It is also the cradle of great glories of Peruvian sport. Also, its people are known for having a marvelous gift for preparing dishes. Jose is a very hardworking youth, but when he has a little free time he likes very much to watch movies but above all being with his family. He is married and together with his spouse he has 2 wonderful children which he loves very much and for whom he works very hard to be able to give them a dignified life and above all a lot of love.

Day to day Jose works as a agricultural laborer on a farm. He works around 8 hours daily. With the fruit of his labor he can support his wife and the expenses of the household. He believes that all is going well with his work because he is very responsible and especially because he has a great desire to succeed.

Jose is very appreciative of the Kiva loans, since thanks to the assistance that they have provided he will be able to purchase materials like cement and sand, among others, to isntall flooring and walls in his home, and in this way improve the quality of life for his family. He will continue working to make his great dream a reality: "To give a good education to his children and be able to finish the construction of his house."

loans.use: to buy materials like cement and sand among others.

loans.name: Cristian Noel

texts.es:
Cristian  tiene 32 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo tiene paisajes muy hermosos, una gastronomía variada y sus pobladores son personas alegres y  muy amables.  Cristian es un joven muy trabajador, pero cuando tiene un tiempito libre le encanta arreglar su huerto y en ocasiones le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Asado de Pollo”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos solo ogro estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de ingeniería mecánica.

Con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo ahorro  Cristian logro iniciar su negocio de venta de comida típica, el trabaja alrededor de 0 horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes diariamente; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene muy buena sazón para la preparación de sus platillos y sobre todo por su carisma.

Cristian está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que el han brindado el podrá comprar arroz, azúcar por saco, así como también carbón al por mayor para poder preparar sus platillos, de esta manera el podrá mejorar sus ingresos, así como también poder atender mejor a sus clientes y así seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener un gran restaurante”.
texts.en:
Cristian is 32 and lives in the city of Pucallpa, a city characterized by the warmth of its climate and of its people. It has beautiful scenery, varied local foods, and happy, friendly inhabitants. Cristian is a hardworking young man, but when he has a short bit of free time, he loves tending to his vegetable garden and on occasion he likes to eat one of his favorite dishes – the delicious “Asado de pollo,” or roasted chicken. Because he has few economic resources, he was only able to study until the fifth grade in secondary school. He would have really liked to study mechanical engineering. 

With a lot of effort and even more saving, Cristian was able to start his business of selling typical food, he works about 10 hours a day, and can attend to up to 40 customers every day. He believes that his business is going well because he has great seasoning for the preparation of his plates and above all, because he is charismatic. 

Cristian is very thankful for the Kiva loans because thanks to the support they have provided, he will be able to purchase rice, sugar by the sack, as well as coal in bulk to be able to make his dishes. This way he will be able to improve his income, and will be able to take better care of his customers and continue to fight to achieve his dream of having a large restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, and sacks of coal

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement, blocks, iron, purlins, zinc wire,and  nails as well as to pay for labour.

loans.name: Wilber Antonio

texts.es: Don Wilber, un pequeño comerciante de frutas y verduras de un mercado de Managua, su esposa trabaja en una farmacia de esa manera ellos se apoyan para sacar adelante a sus dos hijos que estudian y necesitan de mucho cuidado porque están pequeños, al señor Wilber le urge construir otro cuarto, debido a que todos duermen en una misma habitación y es muy incomodo para ellos ya que sus cosas como ropas y zapatos de uso personales las pone agrupadas una encima de otra por la falta de espacio. Por tal motivo acude a solicitar apoyo crediticio para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, piedrines, bloques, hierro, alambre de amarre y el pago de la mano de obra para empezar a construir el cuarto, así brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Wilber is a small businessman who sells fruits and vegetables in a Managua market and his wife works in a pharmacy. In this way they support each other in helping their two children get ahead. Their young children are in school and still require a lot of care. 

Wilber wants to build another room on his house, since now they all sleep in the same bedroom and it is very uncomfortable because there is not enough room for everyone’s clothes, shoes and other personal belongings. Consequently he is requesting a loan in order to buy construction materials, such as cement, sand, gravel, blocks, iron and wire ties and pay for labor, so he can start adding the room.  This will make his family more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as cement, sand, gravel, blocks, iron and wire ties and pay for labo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw materials: wood, nails, drop cloths, glue, and paint.

loans.name: Mnuka Group

texts.en:
Rehema is in her mid-20s and is single. She had a broiler business which she closed after three-fourths of her chickens died, and currently she has been running a pharmacy business for six months. She works daily from 8 AM to 9 PM and is able to make a good monthly profit.

She is requesting her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy chickens (broilers) which died and to cover household expenses, and she has paid back her loan successfully. She hopes for a loan to restock the new pharmacy business items. Her dream is to one day be able to own a wholesale pharmacy.

She will share this loan with her 12-member loan group, Mnuka, who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the new pharmacy business

loans.name: Up To Date Group

texts.en:
Zakaria is in his early 30s and is married.  He has been running a photography business for eight years now. He works from 8:30 am to 6:00 pm daily, and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This loan will be his 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used his previous loans to buy a big camera, buy a flash for his camera, and pay household expenses. He has paid back all his loans successfully. His dream is to one day open a big studio. 

He now wants a loan to start selling gas cookers. Zakaria will share this loan with his loan group, Up to Date, which as a total of 11 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to start selling gas cookers.

loans.name: San José  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal San José está conformado por 9 socias y 1 socio quienes se reúnen una vez al mes en la casa de una de sus compañeras en la comunidad de Ingapirca en Cuenca, este sector es de clima frió, cuenta con una geografía accidentada lo que le da a este lugar hermosos paisajes, su gente se dedica en especial a la cría de animales, a la agricultura y muchos salen de sus comunidades diariamente a la ciudad a trabajar en diversas actividades, trabajos que le permiten solventar los gastos de su hogar y mejorar la economía de sus hogares, su gente como las socias de este banco comunal son personas ambles, gentiles y de un corazón cálido que aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la  Señora. Ana y tiene 43 años de edad, está separada de su esposo pero fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos de 22, 20, 18, 15, 12, 8 años de edad, sus tres primeros hijos trabaja, le ayudan económicamente y están estudiando en un colegio a distancia, sus dos hijos siguientes están estudiando en un colegio y su ultima hija estudia en una escuelita de la localidad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Ana se dedica a la crianza de ganado, borregos y cerdos a los que los vende en su comunidad, como tiene terrenos también se dedica a la agricultura, siembra verduras  que son para el consumo de su hogar y si existe sobrante lo vende. Trabaja también 4 días a la semana como empleada domestica pero solo medio tiempo.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos y alimento para sus animales. 

Su meta es incrementar la producción ganadera.

La foto pequeña es de una socia que pudo estar prresente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
San José communal bank has ten members, nine women and one man. They meet once a month at one of the partners’ houses in the town of Ingapirca, Cuenca. The region has a cold climate and a rugged geography, which provides for a beautiful landscape. Many of region's people work in animal husbandry and agriculture. Others leave their communities every day to go and work in the city, doing all types of jobs to help them pay the household bills and increase their household income. The region's people, just like the members of the communal bank, are friendly, kind and warm-hearted, and they still follow the culture and customs of their towns.    

Ana is one of the members of the communal bank, and she is 43 years old. She is separated from her husband but her marriage produced 6 children, a 22-year-old, a 20-year-old, an 18-year-old, a 15-year-old, a 12-year-old, and an 8-year-old. Her first three children work, help Ana financially and study at a distance-learning college. Two of her children are still finishing high-school, and her youngest child studies at a small school in the community. She owns the house where she lives.

Ana rears cattle, sheep and pigs which she then sells to the local community. On her land she also grows vegetables for household consumption, and sells the extra produce. She also works 4 days a week as a housekeeper, although she only works half-days. Ana is going to use her loan to buy more pigs and animal feed, and her aim is to increase livestock production. 

The small photo in the corner of the main photo depicts one of the members who could not be there on the day the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy pigs and animal feed

loans.name: Mlimani Group

texts.en:
Edda is 38 years old and married with three children (two boys and a girl). Two of the children are in school and the third is still an infant. Since 2010, Edda has been running a retail shop.  She is working hard.  She works from 8am to 12pm daily and she is able to make a small monthly profit. 

Edda is requesting a second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loan to purchase more shop inventory (soda, juice, boxes of different kinds of pens, wheat flour, etc.) and to cover household expenses. She has paid back her loan successfully.  She plans to use the second loan to restock the missing items in her retail shop so she will be able to sell to more people.  Her dream is to one day be able to own a big wholesale shop.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Mlimani" which has a total of 12 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock her retail shop.

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es: Miriam ahora de 30 años de edad, madre soltera de tres hijos siendo el mayor de 9 años por los que trabaja incansablemente para darles lo necesario para su desarrollo y  educación para que sean grandes profesionales en un futuro, todo gracias a su oficio de venta de ropa y cosméticos por lo que solicita crédito nuevamente para comprar productos de los que más se vende los cuales son vanidades, cremas, perfumes, pantalones, camisas, ropa interior; todos vendibles con esta inversión aumentar su inventario, para seguir manteniendo a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
Miriam is a 30-year-old single mother of three children, the oldest of which is nine years old.  She works tirelessly for her children in order to give them what they need to grow and for their education, so that they become great professionals one day.  This is possible thanks to her business selling clothing and cosmetics.
